name: Wooden Arrow
description: An arrow made of  wood. It is an arrow  that is used for a 0  grade bow.

description: A scroll of  enchantment that  resuscitates a dead  person

description: A bronze sword  crafted long ago in  memory of the union  between the Humans  and the Elves.

description: Take this, and the  upper portion of the  blade to Blacksmith  Alltran.

description: A staff issued to  those magicians that  have been  acknowledged as  protectors of the  woods

name: Alberius's List
description: Sentinel Berryos.  Sentinel Veltress.  Sentinel Rayjien.  Deliver this medicine  to Sentinel  Gartrandell.

name: Wand of Adept
description: The wand presented to  those who have  finished their  studies at the school  of magic

name: Gallin's Oak Wand
description: An oak wand enchanted  by Gallint's spell.  This will capture and  seal the spirit of  mirrors.

name: Orc Amulet
description: An amulet that the  Orcs carry for  magical purposes.  Take this to Captain  Gilbert.

name: Red Sunset Staff
description: A staff used by  warriors belonging to  the Red Sunset clan

name: Roien's Letter
description: A letter on which  Roien summarized the  historical  information related  to the Sword of  Solidarity. Take this  to Blacksmith  Alltran.

name: Bone Fragment

name: Ring of Knowledge

name: Necklace of Anguish
description: A silver necklace  engraved with rune  characters of anguish

name: Directions to Ruins
description: Follow the  northwestern path  from the village, and  head west when you  meet the War Victory  Tower. The entrance  to the ruins lies at  the slope of the  mountain.

description: A small wooden shield  that perpetrators of  mages use

name: Orcish Arrowhead
description: An arrowhead that  Lennunt orcs use on  Talking Island.  Collect these and  take to Master Minia.

name: Alberius's Letter
description: A letter from  Alberryus. Take this  to Master Cobendell.

name: Evergreen Amulet
description: A necklace set with a  green elemental  stone. The player  must possess this to  slay the dryad and  obtain the dryad's  tears.

name: Dryad's Tears
description: A jewel that contains  the essence of a  dryad's soul. Gather  ten of these and take  them to Master  Cobendell.

name: Cobendell Medicine
description: A description of  Cobendell's medicine

name: Karrod's Letter
description: The letter written by  Blacksmith Karoyd.  Take this to the  abyssal celebrant  Cecktinon in the  temple of Shilen.

name: Cecktinon's First Voucher
description: An introduction  letter from the  abyssal celebrant  Cecktinon. Take this  and seek Magister  Herne in the village.

name: Cecktinon's Second Voucher
description: An introduction  letter from the  abyssal celebrant  Cecktinon. Go to the  School of Dark Arts,  hunt skeletons, and  gather 10 bone  fragments.

name: Soul Catcher
description: An item used during  the exorcism ritual  to call upon a spirit  of the dead. Take  this to the abyssal  celebrant Cecktinon.

name: Preserving Oil
description: An oil that when  used, prevents the  rotting of corpses.  Take this and go hunt  zombies in the  swamps.

name: Zombie Head
description: The head of tree Elf  zombies that have  been cut after they  are defeated. Take  this to the abyssal  celebrant Cecktinon.

name: Steelbender Head
description: "... hey! Don’t take  me to that  bad-tempered  blacksmith,  please...!"

name: Blood Saber
description: An orihalcon sword  crafted in the Abella  style of the east

name: First Mark of Sentinel
description: The mark that  distinguishes a  member of the elven  guard. Report to  Sentinel Kendnell  after slaying the Orc  ‘Tanuki  Skullcrusher’.

name: Second Mark of Sentinel
description: A mark that signifies  the elven sentinel.  Report to Sentinel  Kendnell after  slaying the Orc  'Tanuki  Skullcrusher'.

name: Skullcrusher Amulet
description: The amulet that  represents the  Skullcrusher Orc  tribe. Take this to  Sentinel Kendnell.

name: Bloodspear Amulet
description: The amulet that  represents the  Bloodspear Orc tribe.  Take this to  Sentinel Kendnell.

name: Red Sunset Sword
description: A sword used by  warriors belonging to  the Red Sunset clan

name: Esrandell's Letter
description: A description of  Esrandell's  introduction

name: Kendell's Letter
description: A description of  Kendnell's letter

name: Onyx Talisman 1
description: A necklace crafted of  onyx. Take this to  Abyssal Celebrant  Kartia.

name: Onyx Talisman 2
description: A necklace crafted of  onyx. Recover the  original scrolls from  the blackskull Orcs  and bring them to  Abyssal Celebrant  Kartia..

name: Ancient Scroll
description: The ancient scroll  called 'Kaisha's  Revelation'. Take  this, along with the  'ancient clay  tablet,' to Abyssal  Celebrant Kartia.

name: Ancient Clay Tablet
description: A tablet where  ancient figures are  recorded. Take this,  along with the  'ancient scroll,' to  Abyssal Celebrant  Kartia.

name: Kartas Translation
description: A translation of  'Kaisha's Revelation'  translated by  Kartia. Take this to  Tetrarch Thifiell.

name: Eldritch Dagger
description: A steel dagger  engraved with the  runes of Shilen and  Gran Kain

name: Harrys's Receipt 1
description: A receipt Harris  received after  ordering tools. Take  this and go to  Blacksmith Alltran.

name: Harrys's Receipt 2
description: The receipt that  Harris has received  after placing an  order for his tools.  Go and gather golem  shards needed for  creating the tool.

name: Golem Shard
description: Shards of rock that  have fallen from the  golem's body. Gather  five of these and  take them to  Blacksmith Alltran.

name: Tool Box
description: A toolbox containing  the tools that  Blacksmith Alltran  has forged. Take this  to Magister Harris  at the temple.

name: Delivery List
description: Take the heavy wooden  box to Trader  Jackson. The bolts of  cloth to Trader  Silvia. Take the clay  pot to the warehouse  keeper Rant.

name: Heavy Wood Box
description: The wooden box to be  delivered to Trader  Jackson of the  weapons shop.

name: Cloth Bundle
description: Bolts of cloth that  need to be delivered  to Trader Silvia of  the grocery store.

name: Clay Pot
description: The clay pot that  must be delivered to  the warehouse keeper  Rant.

name: Jackson's Receipt
description: The receipt that  Jackson has issued  upon receiving his  wooden box. Take this  to Guard Arnold.

name: Silvia's Receipt
description: The receipt that  Silvia has issued  upon receiving her  bolts of cloth. Take  this to Guard Arnold.

name: Rant's Receipt
description: The receipt issued by  Rant upon his  receiving of the clay  pot. Take this to  Guard Arnold.

name: official Letter
description: An official letter  that the Lord of  Gludio has sent to  Sir Colin Windawood,  calling a meeting.  Deliver this to Sir  Windawood.

name: Flame Shard
description: A fragment of  elemental stone of  fire. Can be taken  from the fire spirit  Salamander. Give to  Trader Katrine.

name: Ice Shard
description: A fragment of  elemental stone of  water. Can be taken  from the water spirit  Undine. Give to  Trader Katrine.

name: Lilith's Letter
description: A letter written by  Rylith in longing for  her lover, separated  a thousand years  ago. Find out news  about her lover for  her.

name: Theon's Diary
description: A diary written by  Theon in longing for  his lover, separated  a thousand years ago.  Take this to Rylith.

name: Adamantite Ore
description: Adamantite ore. All  of it is imported  from Gracia. Gather  20 of these and take  them to Gatekeeper  Wilphrod.

name: Clay Tablet
description: A tablet praising  Beleth that the Devil  Nerkas possessed.  Deliver this to High  Priest Biotin.

name: Silvery Spidersilk
description: The spider silk of  the silver spider.  Take this to Trader  Unoren of the weapons  shop.

name: Uno's Receipt
description: The receipt issued by  the magic shop. Take  this and go to  Trader Creamees.

name: Cel's Ticket
description: A ticket issued by  the warehouse. Take  this and go to  Warehouse Keeper  Juria.

name: Nightshade Leaf
description: The leaf of the  nightshade plant.  Take this to Nerupa.

name: Cracked Skull
description: The cracked skull of  the Dark Horror. Take  this to Magister  Vlasty.

name: Perfect Skull
description: Skull of the Dark  Horror. Take this to  Magister Vlasty.

name: Fox Fur
description: A mane of Keltirs. It  is soft and  luxurious, and used  to spin thread and  yarn. Take this to  Cristel.

name: Fox Fur Yarn
description: Yarn spun out of the  fur of Keltirs. Take  this to the former  tailor Warehouse  Keeper Rollfnan, and  he will make it into  the doll's hair.

name: Maiden Doll
description: A doll resembling a  Human maiden. Take  this to Lighthouse  Keeper Rockswell.

name: Plague Dust
description: A powder obtained  from the plague  zombie. Take this to  Hierarch Asterios.

name: Andellia's Letter
description: A letter written by  Andellrias to her  sister Thalya, asking  her to send the  fruit of the  Mothertree.

name: Fruit of The Mother Tree
description: Fruit that the  Mothertree bears once  every few years.  Take this to  Andellria.

name: Rumiel's Poem 1
description: The scroll containing  Rumiel Moonshine's  first poem. Gather  all four and take  them to Sentinel  Stardyen.

name: Rumiel's Poem 3
description: The scroll containing  Rumiel Moonshine's  third poem. Gather  all four and take  them to Sentinel  Stardyen.

name: Rumiel's Poem 4
description: The scroll containing  Rumiel Moonshine's  fourth poem. Gather  all four and take  them to Sentinel  Stardyen.

name: Rumiel's Poem 5
description: The scroll containing  Rumiel Moonshine's  fifth poem. Gather  all four and take  them to Sentinel  Stardyen.

name: Wererat's Fang

name: Varool Foulclaw's Fang
description: The fang of Varool  Foulclaw, leader of  the ratmen. Take this  to Master Ellenia.

name: Kirunak Skull
description: Kirunak's skull  obtained after  killing Kirunak, the  leader of the  drevanuls. Take this  to Trader Creamees.

name: Zombie's Skin
description: A skin obtained from  marshland zombies.  Collect five and go  to Trader Minaless.

name: Nightmare Crystal
description: A crystal used by the  succubus Merkenis to  cast nightmares.  Take this to Tetrarch  Vellior.

description: A spellbook for  learning Light magic

description: A spellbook for  learning Might magic

description: A spellbook for  learning  Ice Bold  magic

description: A spellbook for  learning Battle Heal  magic

description: A spellbook for  learning Vampiric  Touch

description: A spellbook for  learning Flame Strike  magic

description: A spellbook for  learning Cure Poison  magic

description: A spellbook for  learning  Group Heal  magic

name: Spellbook: Curse: Poison
description: A spellbook for  learning Curse Poison  magic

description: A spellbook that is  used to learn the  Curse: Weakness  magic.

name: Spellbook: Summon Meal
description: A spellbook for  learning Summon Meal  magic

name: Spellbook: Shield
description: A spellbook for  learning Shield magic

name: Spellbook: Know Enemy
description: A spellbook for  learning Know Enemy  magic

name: Lesser Healing Potion
description: A magical potion that  slowly restores HP.  Low endurance.

name: Healing Potion
description: A magical potion that  slowly restores HP.  High endurance.

name: Haste Potion
description: A magical potion that  increases the speed

name: Tutorial Parchment
description: Take the tutorial  parchment to  Grandmaster Roien

name: Tutorial Parchment
description: Take the tutorial  parchment to  Grandmaster Roien

name: Tutorial Parchment
description: Take the tutorial  parchment to Nerupa

name: Tutorial Parchment
description: Take the tutorial  parchment to  Mitraell, the chief  of Brown Elves

name: Recommendation
description: Take the  recommendation to  Grandmaster Roien

name: Recommendation
description: Take the  recommendation to  Grandmagister Gallint

name: Leaf of The Mother Tree
description: Take the leaf of the  Mothertree to Nerupa.

name: Blood of Mitraell
description: Take the blood of  Mitraell to Chief  Mitraell.

name: Hyacinth Charm
description: A charm given by  Hierarch Asterios. Go  to the water source  to seek those who  pollute the waters of  the elven village.

name: Hyacinth Charm
description: A charm given by  Hierarch Asterios. Go  to the water source  and obtain five  handfuls of plague  dust from the  zombies.

name: Beginner's Potion
description: A magical potion that  slowly restores HP.  Low endurance.

name: Ship Ticket
description: Ship ticket from  Talking Island to  Gludio

name: Ship Ticket
description: Ship ticket from  Gludio to Talking  Island

name: Collette's Letter
description: First half year  financial summary of  the Steel Gate guild:  balance sheet and  profit and loss  statement of the Dark  Elven Village guild.

name: Venom Sac
description: A poison sac of  poisonous spider.  Gather ten of these  and take to Astaron.

name: Wind Shard
description: A fragment of the  elemental stone of  wind. You can get  them from Lirein, the  wind spirits.  Collect these to take  to Rizraell.

name: Darin's Receipt
description: A receipt for a  magical potion Daring  received after  paying Baulro. This  must be handed to  Baulro.

name: Baulro's Potion
description: A potion of courage  that Baulro has  created for the shy  Daring. But effects  are unknown. This  must be delivered to  Daring.

name: Omen Beast's Eye
description: The first of three  materials Tetrarch  Talloth asked you to  collect.

name: Taint Stone
description: The second of three  materials Tetrarch  Talloth asked you to  collect.

name: Succubus Blood
description: The third of three  materials Tetrarch  Talloth asked you to  collect.

name: Gludio Lord's Mark
description: A mark indicating  that the bearer is  carrying out the  orders of the lord.  Keep this in your  possession and hunt  Orcs or werewolves.

name: Orc's Necklace
description: A bone necklace that  Orc fighters possess  on their bodies for  magic purposes. Take  this to Captain  Gilbert.

name: Werewolf's Fang
description: Fangs from a dead  werewolf. Take this  to Captain Gilbert.

name: Giant Spider's Leg
description: The legs cut off from  a giant spider.  Collect eight of  these and take them  to Alshupes.

name: Undrias's Letter
description: Abyssal Celebrant  Undrias' letter. Take  this letter to  Trader Iria,  Warehouse Keeper  Dorankus, and Master  Trudy.

name: Ceremonial Dagger
description: A ceremonial dagger  used during the mass  of darkness. Take  this to Abyssal  Celebrant Undrias.

name: Dreviant Wine
description: Holy wine used in the  mass of darkness.  Take this to Abyssal  Celebrant Undrias.

name: Garmiel's Scripture
description: The scripture used  during the mass of  darkness. Take this  to Abyssal Celebrant  Undrias.

name: Arujien's Letter
description: The letter that  Arujien has written  in longing for  Greenis. Show this to  Gatekeeper Mintiel.

name: Arujien's Letter
description: The letter that  Arujien has written  in longing for  Greenis. Show this to  Trader Herbtien.

name: Arujien's Letter
description: Arujien's love  letter. Since the  player has shown this  to Mintiel and  Herbtien, the player  must go back to  Arujien.

name: Spellbook: Advanced Attack Power
description: A spellbook for  learning Attack Aura  magic

name: Spellbook: Elemental Heal
description: A spellbook for  learning Elemental  Heal magic

name: Spellbook: Drain Energy
description: A spellbook for  learning Drain Energy  magic

name: Spellbook: Wind Walk
description: A spellbook for  learning Wind Walk  magic

name: Spellbook: Wind Shackle
description: A spellbook for  learning Wind Shackle  magic

name: Cotton Tunic
description: A tunic made of tough  cotton

name: Tunic of Devotion
description: A tunic with rune  characters of mana,  embroidered with silk  thread

name: Tunic of Magic
description: A tunic, comfortably  designed for mages

name: Cotton Stockings
description: A pair of pants made  of tough cotton

name: Stockings of Devotion
description: A pair of pants with  rune characters of  mana, embroidered  with silk thread

name: Stockings of Magic
description: A pair of pants,  comfortably designed  for mages

name: Norman's Letter
description: First half year  financial summary of  the Steel Gate guild:  balance sheet and  profit and loss  statement of the  Gludio region guild.

name: Bone Fragment
description: Bone fragments of the  undead skeletons.  Collect ten of these  and go back to  Magister Harne.

name: Orc Amulet
description: An amulet possessed  by Kaboo Orcs for  magic purposes. Take  it to Sentinel  Rayjien.

name: Orc's Necklace
description: A bone necklace  possessed by Kaboo  Orc fighters for  magic purposes. Take  it to Sentinel  Rayjien.

name: Orc Amulet
description: An amulet that the  balor Orcs possess  for magical purposes.  Take this to Sentry  Kayleen.

name: Orc's Necklace
description: A bone necklace that  the balor Orc  fighters carry for  magical purposes.  Take this to Sentry  Kayleen.

name: Fungus Sac
description: A sac containing  spore pollen. Give 10  spore sacs to  Herbtien.

name: Cobendell's Medicine
description: A fever medicine  concocted by Master  Cobendell.

name: Cobendell's Medicine
description: A fever medicine  concocted by Master  Cobendell.

name: Cobendell's Medicine
description: A fever medicine  concocted by Master  Cobendell.

name: Cobendell's Medicine
description: A fever medicine  concocted by Master  Cobendell.

name: Cobendell's Medicine
description: A fever medicine  concocted by Master  Cobendell.

name: Spiritbound Wand
description: The wand where the  spirit of mirrors is  bound to. Trap all  three spirits of  mirrors into the wand  and take it to  Grandmagister  Gallint.

name: Spiritbound Wand
description: The wand where the  spirit of mirrors is  bound to. Trap all  three spirits of  mirrors into the wand  and take it to  Grandmagister  Gallint.

name: Spiritbound Wand
description: The wand where the  spirit of mirrors is  bound to. Trap all  three spirits of  mirrors into the wand  and take it to  Grandmagister  Gallint.

name: Auron's Letter
description: A letter written by  Master Ainus. Take  this to Trader  Simplon in the Town  of Gludio.

name: Warrior Guild Mark
description: A mark that shows  that player is a  member of the Warrior  Guild. Take this to  the Ruins of Despair  and kill tracker  skeletons.

name: Rusted Bronze Sword
description: An old bronze sword  used by tracker  skeletons. Collect  ten and give them to  Trader Simplon.

name: Rusted Bronze Sword
description: An old and rusted  bronze sword given by  Trader Simplon, who  said it was a 'Sword  of Trial'.Take this  to Master Ainus.

name: Rusted Bronze Sword
description: An old and rusty  bronze sword called  the 'Sword of Trial'.  Use this to hunt  poison spiders and  Trimden.

name: Simplon's Letter
description: A letter written by  Trader Simplon. Take  this to Master Ainus.

name: Poison Spider's Leg
description: A cut leg of a dead  poison spider or a  bind poison spider.  Collect twenty of  these and take to  Master Ainus.

name: Medallion of Warrior
description: Take this medallion  and go to the  grandmaster of the  Warrior's Guild to  change your  occupation to a  warrior.

name: Spellbook: Wind Strike
description: A spellbook for  learning Wind Strike  magic

name: Spellbook: Self Heal
description: A spellbook for  learning Self Heal  magic

name: Spellbook: Heal
description: A spellbook for  learning Heal magic

name: Jenna's Letter
description: A letter from Sentry  Jenine to Master  Harant.

name: Sentry Blade
description: An adamantite sword  newly issued to  sentries.

name: Sentry Blade
description: An adamantite sword  newly issued to  sentries.

name: Sentry Blade
description: An adamantite sword  newly issued to  sentries.

name: Old Bronze Sword
description: A bronze sword used  in the past by  sentries. Recover  this and take it to  Sentry Jenine.

name: Bone Fragment
description: A bone fragment  obtained from the  undead skeletons.  Gather ten bone  fragments and three  Elf skulls, and take  them to Unoren.

name: Elf Skull
description: The skull of an  undead Elf. Gather  ten bone fragments  and three Elf skulls,  and take them to  Unoren.

name: Dark Bezoar
description: Gather 13 dark  bezoars and take them  to Sentry Nelsya.

name: Sword of Ritual
description: Take this sword to  the grandmaster of  the Fighter Guild to  change your  occupation to a  knight.

name: Coin of Lords
description: A gold coin engraved  with the mark of the  lord of Gludio.  Gather three or more  of these to end the  Trial of the Esquire.

name: Coin of Lords
description: A gold coin engraved  with the mark of the  lord of Gludio.  Gather three or more  of these to end the  Trial of the Esquire.

name: Coin of Lords
description: A gold coin engraved  with the mark of the  lord of Gludio.  Gather three or more  of these to end the  Trial of the Esquire.

name: Coin of Lords
description: A gold coin engraved  with the mark of the  lord of Gludio.  Gather three or more  of these to end the  Trial of the Esquire.

name: Coin of Lords
description: A gold coin engraved  with the mark of the  lord of Gludio.  Gather three or more  of these to end Trial  of the Esquire.

name: Coin of Lords
description: A gold coin engraved  with the mark of the  lord of Gludio.  Gather three or more  of these to end the  Trial of the Esquire.

name: Gludio Guard's Badge 1
description: A mark that proves a  member of the guard.  As Captain Bathia  requested, conquest  bugbear raiders.

name: Bugbear Necklace
description: A necklace worn by  bugbears for  incantation purposes.  Collect ten of these  and visit Captain  Bathia.

name: Einhasad Temple Badge 1
description: As High Priest  Raimund requested, go  to the Ruins of  Despair, defeat the  departed spirits of  priests, and collect  12 Einhasad  crucifixes.

name: Einhasad Crucifix
description: A holy symbol of  Einhasad, the god of  light. Collect twelve  of these and go to  High Priest Raimund.

name: Gludio Guard's Badge 2
description: The mark that  distinguishes a  member of the Guard.  As Captain Bezique  requested, conquest  giant spiders.

name: Poison Spider Leg 1
description: A severed leg of a  dead poison spider.  Collect twenty of  these and go to  Captain Bezique.

name: Einhasad Temple Badge 2
description: As High Priest Levian  requested, kill  Langk Lizardmen and  collect the proof.

name: Lizardman's Totem
description: A small sculpture  Langk Lizardmen carry  with them. Collect  twenty of these and  take them to High  Priest Levian.

name: Gludio Guard's Badge 3
description: A mark that proves a  member of the Guard.  As Captain Gilbert  requested, hunt giant  spiders.

name: Giant Spider's Husk
description: The husk of a giant  spider that you  peeled off. Collect  twenty of these and  take them to Captain  Gilbert.

name: Einhasad Temple Badge 3
description: As High Priest Biotin  requested, hunt  Silent Horrors in the  elven ruins.

name: Horrible Skull
description: A skull of an Elf,  which died a long  ago. Collect ten of  these and take them  to High Priest  Biotin.

name: Bezique's Letter
description: Captain Bezique's  letter to Neti. Find  Neti in the Village  of Gludin and give  her the letter.

name: Neti's Bow
description: A favorite bow used  by Neti, who was once  a treasure hunter.  Use this bow to hunt  skeletons and spartoi  of the Ruins of  Despair and gather  bone pieces.

name: Neti's Dagger
description: Once a treasure  hunter, Neti now uses  the dagger. Take  this dagger to hunt  skeletons and spartoi  in the Ruins of  Despair and collect  bone pieces.

name: Spartoi's Bones
description: Undead bone pieces.  Collect ten and take  them to Neti.

name: Horseshoe of Light
description: A proof you received  after passing Neti's  test. You must take  it to Captain  Bezique.

name: Most Wanted List
description: It is written that  whoever does away  with the Cat's Eye  bandits and recovers  the stolen goods will  be rewarded.

name: Stolen Jewelry
description: A fair amount of  jewelry the Cat's Eye  bandits stole. You  must take them to  Captain Bezique.

name: Stolen Tomes
description: A rare tome the Cat's  Eye bandits stole.  You must take it to  Captain Bezique.

name: Stolen Ring
description: An expensive necklace  that the Cat's Eye  bandits have stolen.  You must take it back  to Captain Bezique.

name: Stolen Necklace
description: An expensive necklace  the Cat's Eye  bandits stole. You  must take it to  Captain Bezique.

name: Bezique's Recommendation
description: Take this medallion  to the grandmasters  of the Fighter Guild  to change your  occupation to a  rogue.

name: Letter of Order 1
description: A certificate of  forbidden book  collection given by  Priest Zigaunt. Carry  this around and  collect all the  forbidden books.

name: Letter of Order 2
description: A certificate that  proves that you  represent the  religious body. This  certificate is given  by Priest Zigaunt.  Take this to  Lemoniell for  covenant.

name: Lionel's Book
description: The last book of  Lemoniell. Hand this  book to Grandmagister  Gallint in the  Einhovant School of  Wizardry.

name: Book of Vivyan
description: A forbidden book  Simplon sold to  Viviante. Collect  five forbidden books  and take them to  Priest Zigaunt.

name: Book of Simlon
description: The rest of Simplon's  forbidden books.  Collect five  forbidden books and  take them to Priest  Zigaunt.

name: Book of Praga
description: A forbidden book  Simplon sold to  Praga. Collect five  forbidden books and  take them to Priest  Zigaunt.

name: Certificate of Gallint
description: A certificate that  Gallint gives for  safekeeping of  forbidden books. Give  to Lemoniell and  receive covenant.

name: Pendant of Mother
description: The pendant of his  mother that Guard  Praga lost in the  ruins. Take this to  Guard Praga and  receive a forbidden  book.

name: Necklace of Mother
description: A necklace chain  where a pendant used  to hang. Recover the  pendant from the  zombies in the Ruins  of Sorrow to make it  complete.

name: Lionel's Covenant
description: Lemoniell's pledge  not to use the  forbidden book again.  Give it to Priest  Zigaunt and receive  the Mark of Faith.

name: Mark of Faith
description: Take this token to  the high priest of  the temple to change  your occupation to a  cleric.

name: Sorius's Letter 1
description: A letter received  from Master Sorius to  be given to  Blacksmith Kluto in  the Village of  Gludin.

name: Kluto Box
description: A box that Kluto  asked to give to  Master Sorius.

name: Elven Knight Brooch
description: Take this brooch to  the grandmaster of  the Fighter Guild and  he will change your  occupation to a  knight.

name: Topaz Piece
description: A piece of topaz  obtained from the  undead in the ruins.  Collect twenty to  take to Master  Sorius.

name: Emerald Piece
description: A piece of emerald  obtained from the Ol  Mahum novices.  Collect 20 of these  to take to Blacksmith  Kluto.

name: Reisa's Letter 2
description: Master Reoria's  letter to Guard  Moretti. Find Guard  Moretti and give him  the letter.

name: Prias's Torn Letter 1
description: A torn piece of  letter written by  Prigun and is not  legible. Collect all  four torn pieces and  take them to Guard  Moretti.

name: Prias's Torn Letter 2
description: A torn piece of  letter written by  Prigun and is not  legible  Collect all  four torn pieces and  take them to Guard  Moretti.

name: Prias's Torn Letter 3
description: A torn piece of  letter written by  Prigun and is not  legible. Collect all  four torn pieces and  take them to Guard  Moretti.

name: Prias's Torn Letter 4
description: A torn piece of  letter written by  Prigun and is not  legible. Collect all  four torn pieces and  take them to Guard  Moretti.

name: Moretti's Herb
description: An herb that Guard  Moretti asked to give  to Prigun

name: Guard's Bow
description: A bow given by Guard  Moretti. May be  efficiently used for  some purpose.

name: Moretti's Letter
description: An urgent letter from  Guard Moretti to  Prigun

name: Prias's Letter
description: A reply of Prigun to  the letter from Guard  Moretti. Hand this  to Moretti.

name: Honorary Guard
description: A letter written by  Guard Moretti to  Master Reoria. Take  it to Master Reoria.

name: Reisa's Recommendation
description: Take this  recommendation to the  grandmaster of the  Fighter Guild to  change your  occupation to an  Elven scout.

name: Rosella's Letter
description: A letter from  Rogellia to Elven  Magister Greenis.  Related to ruby, the  symbol of fire.

name: Red Down
description: Material needed to  make ruby of magical  powers. Collect five  and take them to  Magister Greenis for  Magical Power Ruby.

name: Magical Powers Ruby
description: Ruby that symbolizes  fire. Gather four  jewels that symbolize  nature and take them  to Rogellia for a  token to change  occupations.

name: Pure Aquamarine
description: Aquamarine that  symbolizes water.  Gather the four  jewels that symbolize  nature and take them  to Rogellia for a  token to change  occupations.

name: Appetizing Apple
description: A very ripe apple.  Give it to Thalya for  information on the  aquamarine of water.

name: Gold Leaves
description: Leaves used as  fertilizer of the  Mothertree. Collect  five leaves and give  them to Thalya for an  aquamarine.

name: Immortal Love
description: A book Northwindel  wanted to borrow. If  you give this book to  Northwindel, you can  obtain information  on the amethyst.

name: Amethyst
description: An amethyst obtained  by killing sukar  wererat. Give two to  Northwindel for  Nobility Amethyst.

name: Nobility Amethyst
description: Amethyst that  symbolizes wind.  Gather four jewels  that symbolize nature  and take them to  Rogellia for a token  to change  occupations.

name: Rosella's Recommendation
description: Rogellia's  recommendation. If  you show this to  Varsak, you can get  information on  Fertility Peridot.

name: Peridot
description: A peridot you can get  if you kill a sniper  skeleton. If you  collect three and  show them to Varsak,  you can get the  Fertility Peridot.

name: Fertility Peridot
description: A peridot that  symbolizes the earth.  Gather four jewels  that symbolize nature  and take them to  Rogellia for a token  to change  occupations.

name: Eternity Diamond
description: Take this token to  the grandmaster of  the Magician Guild to  change your  occupation to an  Elven wizard.

name: Crystal Medallion
description: A necklace given by  Priest Manuell. Take  this and go to the  port Gludin to find  the girl who works  miracles.

name: Swindler's Money
description: Money from Perrin's  swindling. Give it to  Allana.

name: Allana's Diary
description: A diary with records  of fraud miracle.  Show this to Priest  Manuell as proof.

name: Lizard Captain Order
description: An order of lizard  captain to kidnap the  Sacred Flame of  Prophecy.

name: Leaf of Oracle
description: Take this to the high  priest to change  your occupation to an  oracle.

name: Half of Diary
description: Half of the diary  given by Allana. You  must get money from  Perrin and find the  other half of the  diary.

name: Palus Talisman
description: A talisman inscribed  with Palus runes that  symbolize a deep  lake. Carry this and  hunt lycanthrope in  the Neutral Zone.

name: Lycanthrope Skull
description: A skull obtained  after killing  lycanthrope. Collect  thirteen and take  them to Master  Virgil.

name: Virgil's Letter
description: A letter written by  Master Virgil. Take  this to Abyssal  Celebrant Kalinta of  the Village of  Gludin.

name: Morte Talisman
description: A talisman with  inscription of rune  of Morte, symbol of  death. Carry this and  find materials  needed for coffin.

name: Predator's Carapace
description: A large, hard  carapace. Take this  and five trimden silk  threads to abyssal  celebrant Kalinta.

name: Trimden Silk
description: Trimden's spider web  threads. Take five of  these and a giant  poison spider  carapace to abyssal  celebrant Kainta.

name: Coffin of Eternal Rest
description: A coffin used in  funeral of Dark elven  knight. Take this to  Master Virgil.

name: Gaze of Abyss
description: Take this token to  the grandmaster of  the Fighter Guild to  change your  occupation to a  knight.

name: Shilen's Call
description: A letter received  from Triskel.  Go to  female shaman Arkenia  of the Dark Elf  coming-of-age  ceremony altar.

name: Arkenia's Letter
description: A letter received  from Arkenia. Take  this to Guard Leikan  to hear about  information on thief.

name: Leikan's Note
description: A simple contract  given by Guard  Leikan. Must hunt  moonstone beasts and  collect their molars.

name: Omen Beast's Molar
description: A molar obtained  after killing a  moonstone beast.  Collect 10 of these  to take to Guard  Leikan.

name: Leikan's Knife
description: A knife received as  present from Leikan.  They say it works  well against the  Calpicos.

name: Shilen's Tears
description: Magic liquid stolen  from Dark Elf  coming-of-age  ceremony altar. Give  this to the female  shaman Arkenia.

name: Arkenia's Recommendation
description: A token of thanks  received from  Arkenia. Take this to  Triskel.

name: Iron Heart
description: Take this to the  grandmaster of the  Dark Elven Guild to  change your  occupation to an  assassin.

name: Seeds of Anger
description: A seed that can be  obtained from  Charkeren, who is  full of anger. Take  this to female shaman  Varika.

name: Seeds of Despair
description: Seeds of Despair  given by female  shaman Varika. Must  have to earn Jewel of  Darkness.

name: Seeds of Horror
description: A seed that can be  obtained from  Annsery, who is full  of horror. Take this  to female shaman  Varika.

name: Seeds of Lunacy
description: A seed that can be  obtained from a  lunatic. Take this to  female shaman  Varika.

name: Family's Ashes
description: Ashes of Charkeren's  slain family. Find  three and return to  Charkeren.

name: Varika's Liquor
description: A medicine Varika  made for the son of  Duchess Dwell. If you  give it to Duchess,  you can obtain the  seed of despair.

name: Knee Bone
description: The knee bone of  undead that Annsery  was looking for. Give  this to Annsery to  obtain Seeds of  Horror.

name: Heart of Lunacy
description: The hearts of those  who have been turned  into skeletons by a  Sorcerer of Lunacy.  Collect 3 hearts of  lunacy and take them  to Arkenia.

name: Jewel of Darkness
description: Take this token to  the grandmaster of  the Dark Elven guild  to change your  occupation to a dark  wizard.

name: Sidra's Letter 1
description: The letter of  introduction written  by Magister Sidra.  Take this to Magister  Talbot.

name: Blank Sheet 1
description: A blank scroll. Take  this and hunt dark  succubus to obtain  bloody runes.

name: Bloody Rune 1
description: Runes written with  the blood of dark  succubus. Collect  five and take to  Magister Talbot.

name: Garmiel Book
description: The sacred book of  Gran Kain, god of  darkness, written in  elven language. One  of two books Sidra  told you to find.

name: Prayer of Adonius
description: The widely beloved  prayer book. Take  this to Priest  Adonius in the  village of Gludin.

name: Penitent's Mark
description: The mark that shows  one is in the course  of repenting one's  sins. Carry this and  hunt undead skeletons  in the Ruins of  Despair.

name: Ashen Bones
description: Bones from undead  skeletons in Ruins of  Despair. Gather 10  and take to Priest  Adonius.

name: Andariel Book
description: The sacred book of  Einhasad, god of  light, written in  elven language. One  of two books Sidra  told you to find.

name: Orb of Abyss
description: Take this token to  the grandmaster of  the Dark Elven Guild  to change your  occupation to a  shilien oracle.

name: Mark of Esquire
description: A mark that mark that  indicates an  esquire. Wander  around many villages  in Gludio and meet  guard captains and  high priests.

name: Charm of Grain
description: Greenis' good luck  charm. Kill pincer  spiders and give five  red down to Greenis.

name: Sap of The World Tree
description: Sap of Worldtree that  dryad Ribe likes.  Find five gold leaves  and give them to  Thalya.

name: Lucky Potpourri
description: Northwindel's lucky  potpourri. Give  Northwindel two  amethysts obtained  from killing sukar  wererat.

name: Tamil's Necklace
description: A necklace of Tamato,  Perrin's guard. To  show to Perrin.

name: Kluto's Memo
description: A memo from  Blacksmith Kluto  asking to defeat the  Ol Mahum patrols.

name: Lucky Key
description: A bronze key. Hunt  zombies in the swamp  area, collect three  bones, and take them  to Charkeren.

name: Candle
description: A candle that lights  up the dark. Collect  two knee bones from  the undeads and give  them to Annsery for  the Seeds of Horror.

name: Hub Scent
description: Fragrant herb  potpourri. Obtain 3  hearts of lunacy from  a skeleton scout and  take them to  Arkenia.

name: Map of Luster
description: A map given by flame  salamander. Kill  Pinruk and give the  key of flame to  salamander for the  Token of Fire.

name: Key of Flame
description: The key obtained when  Pinruk dies. Can  obtain Token of Fire  when given to  salamander.

name: Flame Earring
description: The token of fire  given by fire spirit  salamander. Collect  four tokens and give  them to Parina to  receive the token  that enables changing  occupations.

name: Broken Bronze Mirror
description: The mirror given by  wind sylph. Go to  lizardman of the  wastelands and obtain  the wind feather to  give to the wind  sylph.

name: Wind Feather
description: The feather hidden by  wind sylph near the  wastelands. Give to  sylph to receive the  Token of Wind.

name: Wind Bangel
description: The token of wind  given by the wind  spirit sylph. Collect  four tokens and give  them to Parina to  receive the token  that enables changing  occupations.

name: Rama's Diary
description: Kill water seer and  take two sparkle  pebbles to water  Undine for the token  of water.

name: Sparkle Pebble
description: Kill water seer in  Lake Permel for  stones. If you give  this to Water Undine,  she will give you  the token of water.

name: Water Necklace
description: The token of water  given by water spirit  Undine. Collect four  tokens and give them  to Parina to receive  the token that  enables changing  occupations.

name: Rust Gold Coin
description: The coin given by  earth snake. Kill red  bear and give red  soil to earth snake  for Token of Earth.

name: Red Soil
description: The soil obtained  from killing red  bear. Give to earth  snake for the Token  of Earth.

name: Earth Ring
description: Token of Earth given  by earth snake .  Collect four tokens  and give them to  Parina to receive the  token that enables  changing occupations.

name: Bead of Season
description: Take this bead to the  high priest of the  temple to change your  occupation to a  wizard.

name: Rusted Key
description: The key that unlocks  Prigun's shackles.  Take this and go to  Prigun.

name: Spellbook: Advanced Defense Power
description: The spellbook for  learning Defense Aura  magic

name: Long Sword
description: A temporary item for  Kamex

name: Gladius
description: A temporary item for  Kamex

name: Bastard Sword
description: A temporary item for  Kamex

description: A temporary item for  Kamex

description: A temporary item for  Kamex

description: A temporary item for  Kamex

name: Mithril Breastplate
description: A temporary item for  Kamex

name: Tunic of Magic
description: A temporary item for  Kamex

name: Puma Skin Shirt
description: A temporary item for  Kamex

name: White Tunic
description: A temporary item for  Kamex

name: Compound Scale Gaiters
description: A temporary item for  Kamex

name: Mithril Gaiters
description: A temporary item for  Kamex

name: Stockings of Magic
description: A temporary item for  Kamex

name: Puma Skin Gaiters
description: A temporary item for  Kamex

name: Dark Stockings
description: A temporary item for  Kamex

name: Gloves
description: A temporary item for  Kamex

name: Leather Gloves
description: A temporary item for  Kamex

name: Excellent Leather Gloves
description: A temporary item for  Kamex

name: Rip Gauntlets
description: A temporary item for  Kamex

name: Bracer
description: A temporary item for  Kamex

name: Leather Shoes
description: A temporary item for  Kamex

name: Low Boots
description: A temporary item for  Kamex

name: Leather Boots
description: A temporary item for  Kamex

name: Iron Boots
description: A temporary item for  Kamex

name: Boots
description: A temporary item for  Kamex

name: Shield of Grace
description: A temporary item for  Kamex

name: Shield of Victory
description: A temporary item for  Kamex

name: Zubei's Shield
description: A temporary item for  Kamex

name: Otherworldly Shield
description: A temporary item for  Kamex

name: Knight Shield
description: A temporary item for  Kamex

name: Brandish
description: A two-hand sword for  beginners

name: Predator's Fang
description: Collect 100  predator's fangs and  take them to Pixy  Murika.

name: Goblin Club
description: A sturdy club made  from thick tree  branches and carried  by goblins. Take this  to Bri Mec Tran.

name: Glass Shard
description: A broken glass piece.  Can be sold in the  shop for a low price.

name: Emerald
description: Can be sold in the  shop for a high  price.

name: Blue Onyx
description: A blue jewel. Can be  sold in the shop.

name: Onyx
description: A black jewel. Can be  sold in the shop.

name: Silvery Leaf
description: The leaf of a silvery  mistletoe. Can be  sold in the shop.

name: Hub Scent
description: An arrow made from a  piece of sharpened  bone. It is used as  an arrow for a D  grade bow.

name: Fine Steel Arrow
description: A powerful arrow made  of steel. It is used  as an arrow for a C  grade bow.

name: Silver Arrow
description: A steel arrow plated  with silver.

name: Mithril Arrow
description: A steel arrow plated  with mithril.

name: Shining Arrow
description: The most powerful  arrow. Unknown  material

name: Golem's Stoneheart
description: A stone found within  the remains of a  destroyed golem. Take  this to Trader  Lorento.

name: Monster Eye Carcass
description: The carcass of  monster eye. Take  this to Trader  Salient.

name: Basilisk's Gizzard
description: The digestive organ  of basilisk. Take  this to Trader  Salient.

name: Anatomy Diagram
description: A diagram designed by  Avella physicians  for human anatomy.  Use this to perform  Samed’s request.

name: Zombie Head
description: A head of zombie from  ruins. Take this to  Samed of the Town of  Gludio.

name: Zombie Heart
description: A heart of zombie  from ruins. Take this  to Samed in the Town  of Gludio.

name: Zombie Liver
description: A liver of zombie  from ruins. Take this  to Samed in the Town  of Gludio.

name: Skull
description: A skull of skeleton  from ruins. Take this  to Samed in the Town  of Gludio.

name: Rib Bone
description: A rib of skeleton  from ruins. Take this  to Samed in the Town  of Gludio.

name: Spine
description: A spine of skeleton  from ruins. Take this  to Samed in the Town  of Gludio.

name: Arm Bone
description: An arm bone of  skeleton from ruins.  Take this to Samed in  the Town of Gludio.

name: Thigh Bone
description: A thigh bone of  skeleton from ruins.  Take this to Samed in  the Town of Gludio.

name: Complete Skeleton
description: A complete skeleton  put together with  bone pieces by  undertaker Varsak.  Take this to Samed in  the Town of Gludio.

name: Red Cross Badge
description: A soldier badge of  foreign troops. Take  this to Leopold of  the Village of  Gludin.

name: Blue Cross Badge
description: A badge of high  ranking of Grecian  foreign troops. Take  this to Leopold of  the Village of  Gludin.

name: Black Cross Badge
description: A badge of captain  ranking of Grecian  foreign troops. Take  this to Leopold of  the Village of  Gludin.

name: Spider's Carapace
description: The hard carapace of  a spider. Often used  to coat a shield or a  helmet. Take this to  Trader Arodin.

name: Spider Silk
description: Tough, stretchy  spider web. Used to  make bowstrings. Take  this to Trader  Arodin.

name: Spider Venom Sac
description: A sac with a spider's  deadly poison in it.  Can be sold to  Trader Cullinas in  the Village of  Gludin.

name: Broken Stoneheart
description: A small pieces of  stone found within  the remains of a  destroyed golem. Take  this to Trader  Lorento.

name: Monster Eye's Lens
description: The transparent part  of monster eye. Take  this to Trader  Salient.

name: Wolf Claw
description: Collect 50 wolf claws  and take them to  Trader Paint of the  weapons and armor  shop.

name: Imp Shackles
description: The metal shackles  attached around the  neck of the imp race.  Take this to Sentry  Krpion.

name: Black Lion Mark
description: The mark that  indicates one is a  member of the Black  Lion troop

name: Spellbook: Aqua Swirl
description: A spellbook for  learning Aqua Swirl  magic

name: Spellbook: Twister
description: A spellbook for  learning Twister  magic

name: Spellbook: Blaze
description: A spellbook for  learning Blaze magic

name: Magic Gem
description: A magical ingredient  needed for certain  magic

name: Greater Haste Potion
description: A magical potion that  increases speed of  movement

name: Greater Swift Attack Potion
description: Description of the  potion that increases  speed of attack

name: Guard Spear
description: A spear that guards  use

name: Spellbook: Poison Recovery
description: A spellbook for  learning Poison  Recovery

name: Spellbook: Touch of God
description: A spellbook for  learning Divine Heal

name: Spellbook: Cure Bleeding
description: A spellbook for  learning Cure  Bleeding

name: Spellbook: Zero Gravity
description: A spellbook for  learning Entangle

name: Spellbook: Freezing Strike
description: A spellbook for  learning Freezing  Strike

name: Spellbook: Power Break
description: A spellbook for  learning Power Break

name: Spellbook: Poison
description: A spellbook for  learning Poison

name: Spellbook: Speed Walk
description: A spellbook that is  used to learn the  Speed Walk skill.

name: Spellbook: Recharge
description: A spellbook for  learning Recharge

name: Spellbook: Disrupt Undead
description: A spellbook for  learning Disrupt  Undead

name: Spellbook: Resist Poison
description: A spellbook for  learning Resist  Poison

name: Spellbook: Mental Shield
description: A spellbook for  learning Mental  Shield

name: Spellbook: Holy Weapon
description: A spellbook for  learning Holy Weapon

name: Spellbook: Regeneration

name: Spellbook: Quickness

description: A spellbook for  learning Sleep

description: A spellbook for  learning Surrender to  Water

name: Spellbook: Surrender to Wind
description: A spellbook for  learning Surrender to  Water

name: Spellbook: Erase Hostility
description: A spellbook that is  used to learn the  Erase Hostility  skill.

name: Spellbook: Focus
description: A spellbook for  learning Focus

name: Spellbook: Concentration
description: A spellbook for  learning  Concentration

name: Spellbook: Surrender to Fire
description: A spellbook for  learning Surrender to  Fire

name: Spellbook: Arcane Acumen
description: A spellbook for  learning Acumen

name: Spellbook: Agility
description: A spellbook for  learning Agility

name: Spellbook: Summon Black Cat
description: A spellbook for  learning Summon Cat  the Cat

name: Spellbook: Servitor Mana Charge
description: A spellbook that is  used to learn the  Servitor Mana Charge  skill.

name: Spellbook: Servitor Heal
description: A spellbook for  learning Servitor  Heal

name: Spellbook: Fast Servitor
description: A spellbook for  learning Fast  Servitor

name: Spellbook: Bright Servitor
description: A spellbook for  learning Bright  Servitor

description: A spellbook for  learning Slow

name: Spellbook: Poison Cloud
description: A spellbook for  learning Poison Cloud

name: Spellbook: Aura Burn
description: A spellbook for  learning Aura Burn

name: Spellbook: Auqa Resistance
description: A spellbook for  learning Aqua Resist

name: Spellbook: Wind Resistance
description: A spellbook for  learning Wind Resist

name: Spellbook: Fire Resistance
description: A spellbook for  learning Fire Resist

name: Spellbook: Dryad Root
description: A spellbook for  learning Dryad Root

name: Spellbook: Curse Bleary
description: A spellbook for  learning Curse Chaos

name: Spellbook: Surrender to Earth
description: A spellbook for  learning Surrender to  Earth

name: Spellbook: Surrender to Poison
description: A spellbook for  learning Surrender to  Poison

name: Proof of Blood
description: An item needed to  upgrade the skill of  Blood Pledge to three

name: Ingredient List
description: A list of cooking  ingredients from  Jonas. Mandragora  essence. Honey.  Dionian potato. Marsh  moss. Floating eye  meat.

name: Sonia's Botany Book
description: A picture that shows  what a mandragora  looks like. You need  this to get  mandragora roots.

name: Red Mandragora Root
description: Red mandragora root.  Collect these to take  them to Trader  Sonia.

name: White Mandragora Root
description: Rare white mandragora  root. Collect these  to take them to  Trader Sonia.

name: Red Mandragora Sap
description: Red mandragora sap.  One of the five  ingredients needed  for Jonas' cooking.

name: White Mandragora Sap
description: Transparent  mandragora sap. One  of the ingredients  needed for Jonas'  cooking.

name: Jacob's Insect Book
description: A diagram that  depicts the drawing  of a bee. You must  possess this in order  to obtain Nectar and  Royal Jelly from the  bloody bee or the  weird bee.

name: Nectar
description: Honey water taken  from a giant bee.  Collect 20 of these  to take them to Guard  Jaycub.

name: Royal Jelly
description: A rare ingredient  that can be taken  only from newborn  working bees. Collect  these and take them  to Guard Jaycub.

name: Honey
description: Honey made from the  nectar you collected  from bees. One of the  five ingredients  needed for Jonas'  cooking.

name: Golden Honey
description: Golden honey made  from the nectar and  the royal jelly you  collected from bees.  One of the five  ingredients needed  for Jonas' cooking.

name: Pano's Contract
description: A contract Grocer  Pano gave you. It  says, if you kill  Hobgoblins and bring  30 pieces of proof,  he will give you  potatoes as a reward.

name: Hobgoblin Amulet
description: An amulet made of a  feather that  Hobgoblins carry on  their bodies. Collect  30 of these and take  them to Grocer Pano.

name: Dionian Potato
description: The highest-quality  potatoes grown in the  rich soil of  southern Dion. One of  the five ingredients  needed for Jonas'  cooking.

name: Glyvka's Botany Book
description: A picture that  explains how to  collect moss. You  need this to collect  marsh moss from Grey  ants or Crimson ants.

name: Green Marsh Moss
description: Green Marsh Moss.  This is sometimes  used in cooking.  Collect this and take  it to Priestess  Glyvka.

name: Brown Marsh Moss
description: Rare Brown Marsh  Moss. Its flavors are  superior to the  green ones. Collect  this and take it to  Priestess Glyvka.

name: Green Moss Bundle
description: A bundle of  well-cared-for moss,  collected from a  marshy place for  cooking. One of the  five ingredients  needed for Jonas'  cooking.

name: Brown Moss Bundle
description: A bundle of  well-cared-for moss,  collected from a  marshy place for  cooking. One of the  five ingredients  needed for Jonas'  cooking.

name: Rolant's Creature Book
description: A picture that shows  what  a Monster Eye  looks like. You need  this to collect the  right Monster Eye  searcher or the  Monster Eye gazer.

name: Body of Monster Eye
description: Severed flesh of the  dead body of Monster  Eye. Take this to  Magister Rollant.

name: Meat of Monster Eye
description: The dead body of a  Monster Eye, ready to  cook. One of the  five ingredients  needed for Jonas'  cooking.

name: Jonas's Steak Dish 1
description: A plate that contains  Jonas' Monster Eye  steak. Take this to  Magister Mirien.

name: Jonas's Steak Dish 2
description: A plate that  contains Jonas'  Monster Eye steak.  Take this to Magister  Mirien.

name: Jonas's Steak Dish 3
description: A plate that  contains Jonas'  Monster Eye steak.  Take this to Magister  Mirien.

name: Jonas's Steak Dish 4
description: A plate that  contains Jonas'  Monster Eye steak.  Take this to Magister  Mirien.

name: Jonas's Steak Dish 5
description: A plate that  contains Jonas'  Monster Eye steak.  Take this to Magister  Mirien.

name: Mirien's Review 1
description: A letter from  Magister Mirien about  the taste of Jonas’  dish. Take this to  Jonas.

name: Mirien's Review 2
description: A letter from  Magister Mirien about  the taste of Jonas’  dish. Take this to  Jonas.

name: Mirien's Review 3
description: A letter from  Magister Mirien about  the taste of Jonas’  dish. Take this to  Jonas.

name: Mirien's Review 4
description: A letter from  Magister Mirien about  the taste of Jonas’  dish. Take this to  Jonas.

name: Mirien's Review 5
description: A letter from  Magister Mirien about  the taste of Jonas’  dish. Take this to  Jonas.

name: Harpy Feather
description: A feather taken from  a Harpy. Collect  these and take them  to Guard Beltkem.

name: Medusa Venom
description: Poison extracted from  the snake hair of a  Medusa. Collect these  and take them to  Guard Beltkem.

name: Wyrm's Tooth
description: A sharp fang of a  Wyrm. Collect these  and take them to  Guard Beltkem.

name: Jonas’S Salad Recipe
description: Jonas' recipe for  making marsh moss  salad.

name: Jonas’S Sauce Recipe
description: Jonas' recipe for  making mandragora  sauce.

name: Jonas’S Salad Recipe
description: Jonas' recipe for  making Monster Eye  meat steak.

name: Crystal: D Grade
description: The crystal of D  Grades

name: Crystal: C Grade
description: The crystal of C  Grades

name: Crystal: B Grade
description: The crystal of B  Grades

name: Crystal: A Grade
description: The crystal of A  Grades

name: Crystal: S Grade
description: The crystal of S  Grades

name: Soulshot: D Grade
description: The Soul Shot of D  Grades

name: Soulshot: C Grade
description: The Soul Shot of C  Grades

name: Soulshot: B Grade
description: The Soul Shot of B  Grades

name: Soulshot: A Grade
description: The Soul Shot of A  Grades

name: Soulshot: S Grade
description: The Soul Shot of S  Grades

name: Gludin Panacen
description: A medicated herb from  Gludio. Purchase at  the Castle Gludio.

name: Gludin Vermouth
description: Medicated wine from  Gludio. Purchase at  the Castle Gludio.

name: Artemeter
description: A medicated herb from  Gludio. Purchase at  the Castle Gludio.

name: Kasha Wolf Fang
description: A fang that is  obtained by killing a  kasha wolf. Collect  fifty and take these  to Praetorian Rukain.

name: Grave Robber's Head
description: The head of goblin  robbers, who damaged  the graves of Orc  ancestors. Collect  fifty to take to Seer  Livina.

name: Black Soulstone
description: A black soulstone  pulled out of the  heart of a rakeclaw  imp. Collect these to  take to Atuba Chief  Varkees.

name: Red Soulstone
description: A red soulstone  pulled out of the  heart of a rakeclaw  imp. Collect these to  take to Atuba Chief  Varkees.

name: Maraku Werewolf Head
description: The head of a Maraku  Werewolf that has  been cut off after  they were defeated.  Collect forty of  these and take them  to Prefect Brukurse.

name: Darkwing Bat Fang
description: A fang of a Darkwing  bat. Collect 70 of  these and take them  to Neruga Chief  Tantus.

name: Varangka's Parasite
description: The parasite-type  evil spirit that  calls Varangka's  tracker.

name: Kasha Parasite
description: A parasite-type evil  spirit that comes out  of the gray bear  polluted by kasha's  evil spirit. This is  the key calling forth  the kasha totem  spirit.

name: Kasha Crystal
description: A crystal obtained by  killing the gray  bear totem polluted  by kasha's evil  spirit. Take this to  Seer Tanapi.

name: Black Wolf Pelt
description: Pelt of a black wolf.  Collect 40 to take  to Marife Redbonnet.

name: Goblin Necklace
description: A necklace obtained  by killing a  low-level goblin.  Collect these and  take them to Elder  Spiron.

name: Goblin Pendant
description: A necklace obtained  by killing a  high-level goblin.  Collect these and  take them to Elder  Spiron.

name: Goblin Lord Pendant
description: A necklace obtained  by killing the goblin  lord. Collect these  and take them to  Elder Spiron.

name: Suspicious Memo
description: A suspicious memo  obtained by killing a  goblin brigand  leader. Take this to  Elder Spiron.

name: Suspicious Contract
description: A suspicious contract  completed by  collecting suspicious  memos.  This  contract reveals that  the Silver Balance  Guild requested the  brigands to attack  the freight wagons.

name: Oriharukon Ore
description: Chrysolite ore taken  by defeating Utuku  orcs. Collect these  and take them to  Elder Filaur.

name: Torn Map Fragment
description: A part of the map  that reveals the  hidden vein of  Chrysolite. If you  collect four pieces,  you can complete a  map.

name: Hidden Ore Map
description: A map that reveals  the hidden vein of  Chrysolite. Take this  to Elder Filaur.

name: Bat Fang
description: A fang taken by  killing a blade bat  or a barb bat.  Collect 100 and take  them to Elder Keef

name: Floating Stone
description: A stone that floats  on water. Obtain it  from Magical Weaver.  Collect 50 and take  them to Elder Arin.

name: Tarantula Spider Silk
description: The spider silk that  makes when making  their nests. Collect  these and take them  to Trader Mion.

name: Tarantula Spinnerette
description: A pocket shaped organ  that makes spider  silk. Take this to  Defender Nathan.

name: Giant Spider Skin
description: The husk of a giant  spider that you  peeled off. Collect  there and take them  to Edmond.

name: Voucher of Flame
description: This token represents  the qualification of  Orc fighters. Take  this and go to the  Guardian of Flame  Vullkus.

name: Necklace of Flame
description: The necklace of flame  given by Vullkus.  Hand this to Kakai,  the Lord of Flame,  and also the king of  the Orcs.

name: License of Miner
description: A license given to  Dwarves to allow them  mining. Take this  and go to Foreman  Laferon.

name: Laferon's Recommendation
description: The recommendation of  Foreman Laferon.  Take this and go to  First Elder Lockirin.

name: Totem of Hestui
description: The totem of the  Hestui. Can be sold  in the shop for a  high price.

name: Maraku Werewolf Totem
description: Maraku Wolfmen Totem.  Can be sold in the  shop.

name: Grandma's Pearl
description: An article left by  the grandmother of  the redbonnet. Can be  sold in the shop for  a high price.

name: Grandma's Mirror
description: An article left by  the grandmother of  the redbonnet. Can be  sold in the shop.

name: Grandma's Necklace
description: An article left by  the grandmother of  the redbonnet. Can be  sold in the shop.

name: Grandma's Hairpin
description: An article left by  the grandmother of  the redbonnet. Can be  sold in the shop.

name: Necklace of Courage
description: A necklace that is  given to young Orcs  who have proved their  courage

name: Necklace of Valor
description: The necklace that is  given to young Orcs  who have proved their  valor

name: Ring of Raccoon
description: A ring given to  apprentices of the  Bronze Key Guild

name: Ring of Firefly
description: A ring given to  apprentices of the  Black Anvil Guild

name: Butcher's Sword
description: A sword granted to  young Orc fighters  who distinguished  themselves at war

name: Silversmith Hammer
description: A hammer silversmiths  of the ancient  Elmoreden used

name: Blessed Scroll of Escape
description: A magical scroll that  relocates the player  to the nearest  village

name: Honey Khandar
description: A miraculous medicine  made of the mixture  of honey and khandar  extract. Take this to  Centurion Nakusin.

name: Bear Fur Cloak
description: A cloak made of  grizzly bear's fur.  Excellent for keeping  warm. Take this to  Centurion Nakusin.

name: Bloody Axe
description: An axe that holds the  blood of wild  animals. It is said  to strengthen its  owner’s life force.  Take this to  Centurion Nakusin.

name: Ancestor Skull
description: A skull of an  ancestor of Urutus.  It is said to  strengthen its  owner's life force.  Take this to  Centurion Nakusin.

name: Spider Dust
description: A grain of powder  made of dried legs of  poisonous spiders.  Smelling it will make  you feel refreshed.  Take this to  Centurion Nakusin.

name: Deep Sea Orb
description: A pearl brought out  of a deep sea. It is  said to help predict  the future. Take this  to Centurion  Nakusin.

name: Bolter's List
description: The list of things  that Bolter wants you  to bring from the  village.

name: Mining Boots
description: A pair of mining  boots you got from  Trader Garita. Take  this to Miner Bolter.

name: Miner's Pick
description: A miner's pick you  got from Blacksmith  Bronp. Take this to  Miner Bolter.

name: Boomboom Powder
description: A sack of boomboom  powder you got from  Trader Cha-Li. Take  this to Miner Bolter.

name: Redstone Beer
description: Delicious beer you  got from Warehouse  Chief Reed. Take this  to Miner Bolter.

name: Bolter's Smelly Socks
description: A pair of socks that  Miner Bolter gave  you. For what...?

name: Hatos's Order 1
description: An order to kill the  secret envoy of  Baranka. Kill  Baranka's messenger,  find the secret  letter, and take it  to Urutu Chief Hatos.

name: Hatos's Order 2
description: An order to kill the  secret envoy of  Baranka. Kill  Baranka's messenger,  find the secret  letter, and take it  to Urutu Chief Hatos.

name: Hatos's Order 3
description: An order to kill the  secret envoy of  Baranka. Kill  Baranka's messenger,  find the secret  letter, and take it  to Urutu Chief Hatos.

name: Letter to Dark Elf
description: A secret letter from  Baranka to Dark Elf  Magister Kaland. Take  this to the Urutu  Chief Hatos.

name: Letter to Human
description: A secret letter from  Barnaka to Duke Van  Halter. Take this to  the Urutu Chief  Hatos.

name: Letter to Elf
description: A secret letter from  Baranka to Elf Master  Laria. Take this to  the Urutu Chief  Hatos.

name: Gouph's Contract
description: Collector Gouph drew  up this contract when  buying the star  diamond from Trader  Reep. Take this to  Trader Reep.

name: Reep's Contract
description: Trader Reep drew up  this contract when he  requested the  delivery of the star  diamond. Take this to  Carrier Torocco.

name: Elven Wine
description: Carrier Torocco  bought this high  quality wine to give  it to his old friend,  Maron, as a present.  Take this to Miner  Maron.

name: Brunon's Dice
description: This dice was  specially made for  gambling. Take these  to Blacksmith Bronp.

name: Brunon's Contract
description: This contract says if  Bronp gets the 20  stolen jewels back  from goblins, he can  get the star diamond  back.

name: Aquamarine
description: This jewel is  obtained by the  goblin brigand  leader. Take 10  aquamarines and 10  chrysoberyls to  Blacksmith Bronp.

name: Chrysoberyl
description: This jewel is  obtained by the  goblin brigand  leader. Take 10  aquamarines and 10  chrysoberyls to  Blacksmith Bronp.

name: Gem Box
description: Blacksmith Bronp  gives this Gem Box.  Take this to  Collector Gouph.

name: Coal Piece
description: This coal piece is in  the gem box. Take  this to Blacksmith  Bronp.

name: Brunon's Letter
description: Blacksmith Bronp  sends this letter to  Warehouse Keeper  Murphrin  asking for  the right box.

name: Berry Tart
description: Sweet  strawberry-flavored  tart. Warehouse  Keeper Murphrin sends  this to Warehouse  Keeper Airy as a  present of apology.

name: Bat Diagram
description: This diagram shows  the blade bat in  details. Take this  and go hunt blade  bats to obtain the  star diamond.

name: Star Diamond
description: Everyone is looking  for this diamond.  Take this to the real  owner.

name: Starstone 1
description: A mineral collected  from the destroyed  greystone golem.  Collect 20 of these  and take them to  Gatekeeper Tamil.

name: Starstone 2
description: A mineral obtained by  defeated whinstone  golems. Collect  twenty and take them  to Gatekeeper Wirphy.

name: Mirien's Review 2
description: A letter Magister  Mirien wrote after  tasting Jonas' dish.  Take this and go to  Jonas.

name: Mirien's Review 3
description: A letter Magister  Mirien wrote after  tasting Jonas' dish.  Take this to Jonas.

name: Mirien's Review 4
description: A letter Magister  Mirien wrote after  tasting Jonas' dish.  Take this to Jonas.

name: Mirien's Review 5
description: A letter Magister  Mirien wrote after  tasting Jonas' dish.  Take this to Jonas.

name: Green Blood
description: Goblin's blood. If  you have enough of  this item, the Kuruka  Ratman Leader  appears.

name: Goblin Dwelling Map
description: A map showing  goblins' dwelling.  Take this and find  the goblin tribes and  destroy them.

name: Kuruka Ratman Tooth
description: A tooth obtained  after killing Kuruka  ratman leader.  Collect ten of these  to take to Prefect  Karukia.

name: Betrayer Sue Report
description: A record that shows  where the betrayer  Sue is. Slay the  betrayer and take  proof to Prefect  Kasman.

name: Betrayer Wanuk Report
description: A record that shows  where the betrayer  Wanuk is. Slay the  betrayer and take  proof to Prefect  Kasman.

name: Betrayer Chewba Report
description: He is located between  the army post of  Grecia and the  northern part of the  Grim Ruins. Dispose  of him and take the  mark as a proof to  Prefect Kasman.

name: Betrayer Heitafu Report
description: He can be found in  the advance outpost  located in the  southwestern part of  the Tollgate. Dispose  of him and take the  mark as a proof to  Prefect Kasman.

name: Betrayer Picubo Report
description: A record that shows  where the betrayer  Picubo is. Punish him  and take his severed  head to Prefect  Kasman as proof.

name: Betrayer Bumbum Report
description: He is located near  the Tollgate. Dispose  of him and take the  mark as a proof to  Prefect Kasman.

name: Betrayer Minsku Report
description: He is located in the  southern part of the  Wasteland near the  sea. Dispose of him  and take the mark as  a proof to Prefect  Kasman.

name: Betrayer Chuchu Report
description: A record that shows  where the betrayer  Chuchu is. Punish him  and take his severed  head to Prefect  Kasman as proof.

name: Betrayer Umbar Report
description: He is located close  to an intersection of  three roads in the  Neutral Zone. Dispose  of him and take the  mark as a proof to  Prefect Kasman.

name: Betrayer Zakan Report
description: He is located in the  northern part of the  wasteland near the  outpost. Dispose of  him and take the mark  as a proof to  Prefect Kasman.  Dispose of him and  take the mark as a  proof to Prefect  Kasman.

name: Head of Betrayer
description: The head of an orc  who has been beheaded  for betraying his  own clan. Collect 2  of them and take them  to Prefect Kasman in  Gludin Village.

name: Mark of Raider
description: A necklace given to  Orc raider that has  earned the  qualification to  become an Orc raider.  Take this to the  high prefect to  change your  occupation to an Orc  raider.

name: Pomegranate
description: A red pomegranate  fruit given by  Gantaki. Take this  and go to Khavatari  Rosheek.

name: Leather Pouch 1
description: A leather pouch given  by Khavatari  Rosheek. Take this  and hunt kasha bears  and collect five of  their claws.

name: Leather Pouch 2
description: A leather pouch given  by Khavatari  Rosheek. Hunt kasha  blade spiders with  this and collect five  talons.

name: Leather Pouch 3
description: A leather pouch  Khavatari Rosheek  gave you. Take this  to hunt Scarlet  Salamanders for five  of their scales.

name: Leather Pouch 1 (Full)
description: A pouch that contains  five kasha bear  claws. Take this to  Khavatari Rosheek.

name: Leather Pouch 2 (Full)
description: A pouch that contains  five pincers of  kasha blade spider  talon. Take this to  Khavatari Rosheek.

name: Leather Pouch 3 (Full)
description: A pouch that contains  five scales from the  Scarlet Salamander.  Take this to  Khavatari Rosheek.

name: Kasha Bear Claw
description: A claw pulled out  from kasha bear after  killing it. Collect  five of these.

name: Kasha Blade Spider Talon
description: A talon pulled out  from kasha blade  spider after killing  it. Collect five of  these.

name: Scarlet Salamander Scale
description: A scale of scarlet  salamander. Gather  five of these.

name: Fiery Spirit Scroll
description: The first scroll  containing secret of  kabart, the Orcs'  traditional martial  arts.

name: Rosheek's Letter
description: A letter written by  Khavatari Rosheek.  Take this to Gantaki  Zu Urutu.

name: Gantaki's Letter of Recommendation
description: Gantaki's letter of  recommendation.  Receive the help of  Gatekeeper Tamil and  take this  recommendation to  Prefect Kasman in the  Village of Gludin.

name: Fig
description: A fig given by  Prefect Kasman.  Take  this to Khavatari  Toruku.

name: Leather Purse 4
description: A leather purse given  by Khavatari Toruku.  Take this, kill  fighters of various  races and collect 12  tokens.

name: Leather Pouch 4 (Full)
description: A full pouch of 12  tokens after killing  fighters of various  races. Take this to  Khavatari Toruku.

name: Vuku Orc Tusk
description: A tusk obtained after  killing vuku Orc.  Gather three of  these.

name: Ratman Fang
description: A fang from a dead  ratman fighter.  Gather three of  these.

name: Langk Lizardman Tooth
description: A tooth obtained  after killing langk  lizardman. Gather  three of these.

name: Felim Lizardman Tooth
description: A tooth obtained  after killing the  Felim Lizardman.  Gather 3 of these.

name: Iron Will Scroll
description: The second scroll  that contains secret  of the Orcs'  traditional martial  arts, Kabart.

name: Toruku's Letter
description: A letter from  Khavatari Toruku.  Take this to Prefect  Kasman.

name: Khavatari Totem
description: A token given to one  who has  qualifications to  change occupations to  Orc monk. Take this  to the high prefect  to change your  occupation to an Orc  monk.

name: Fire Charm
description: A charm with  inscription of fire  mantra. Take this and  find the three items  that Tataru spoke  of.

name: Kasha Bear Pelt
description: A pelt of kasha bear.  Take to Tataru along  with kasha  bladespider husk and  fiery egg.

name: Kasha Blade Spider Husk
description: A husk of kasha  bladespider. Take to  Tataru along with  kasha bear pelt and  fiery egg.

name: Fiery Egg 1
description: A spirit egg obtained  from Scarlet  Salamander. Take to  Tataru along with  kasha bear pelt and  kasha bladespider  husk.

name: Hestui Mask
description: A mask in shape of  bear. Take this and  go to Hestui Totem  Spirit.

name: Fiery Egg 2
description: A spirit egg received  from Scarlet  Salamander. Take this  to the Hestui Totem  Spirit.

name: Totem Spirit Claw
description: A claw received from  Hestui Totem Spirit.  Take this and go to  Tataru.

name: Tataru's Letter of Recommendation
description: A letter written by  Tataru. Take this to  Seer Umos in the Town  of Gludio.

name: Flame Charm
description: A charm with  inscription of flame  mantra. Take this and  gather grizzly blood  and take to Seer  Umos.

name: Grizzly Blood
description: A glass bottle filled  with grizzly blood.  Gather three and take  to Seer Umos.

name: Blood Cauldron
description: A cauldron filled  with grizzly blood.  Take this to the  Dudamara Totem  Spirit.

name: Spirit Net
description: A net made with  spirit's spider silk.  Use this to capture  Durka Spirit hidden  inside poison  spiders.

name: Bound Durka Spirit
description: Durka spirit bound  inside spirit net.  Take this to the  Dudamara Totem  Spirit.

name: Durka Parasite
description: An evil parasite  spirit that comes out  from spiders  contaminated with the  evil durka spirit.  It is the key for  calling upon the evil  durka spirit.

name: Totem Spirit Blood
description: Blood spilt by the  Dudamara Totem  Spirit. Take this and  go to Seer Umos.

name: Mask of Medium
description: A token that shows  one has the  qualifications to  become an Orc shaman.  Take this to the  high prefect, to  change your  occupation to an Orc  shaman.

name: Silvery's Ring
description: A ring given to  artisan aspirants by  Blacksmith Silvery.  Strike down boogle  ratman gang and  collect their front  teeth.

name: 1St Pass Certificate
description: The certificate for  passing the 1st  artisan test. To take  the next test, you  must go to Blacksmith  Kluto of the village  Gludin.

name: 2Nd Pass Certificate
description: The certificate for  passing the 2nd  artisan test. Take  this and go to  Blacksmith Kluto in  Gludin.

name: Final Pass Certificate
description: The certificate for  passing the final  artisan test. Take  this to the head  blacksmith to change  occupations to an  artisan.

name: Boogle Ratman Tooth
description: The ugly front  bucktooth of a boogle  ratman. Just looking  at it will make you  nauseous. Collect ten  of these and take  them to Blacksmith  Silvera.

name: Boogle Ratman Leader's Big Tooth
description: The boogle ratman  leader's big tooth.  Before its stink make  you pass out,  collect 2 of them and  take them to  Blacksmith Silvera.

name: Kluto's Letter
description: Blacksmith Kluto's  letter. Take to  Blacksmith Pinter in  the Town of Gludio.

name: Footprint of Thief
description: Trace left by  thieves. Kill Vuku  Orc fighters, recover  stolen items and  take them to  Blacksmith Kluto.

name: Stolen Secret Box 1
description: A secret box stolen  by Vuku orc fighters.  The contents of the  box are unknown, but  anyway, take it to  Blacksmith Pinter.

name: Secret Box 2
description: A secret box received  from Pinter. The  contents are unknown,  but do not worry and  take it to  Blacksmith Kluto in  the Village of  Gludin.

name: Ring of Raven
description: A mark of proof  indicating that you  have obtained a  Scavenger license. If  you take it to a  Warehouse Chief, you  can transfer your  class to become a  Scavenger.

name: Pippi's Letter of Recommendation
description: A letter of  introduction written  by Collector Pipi.  Take this to Trader  Mion.

name: Raut's Teleport Scroll
description: An order sheet given  by Warehouse keeper  Rout. Give it to  Torai, in the south  of the Corridor of  Death.

name: Succubus Undies
description: The underwear of  Succubus received  from Torai. Take this  to Warehouse Keeper  Raut of Gludin.

name: Mion's Letter
description: A letter sent from  Trader Mion to her  brother. Take this  letter and go to  Master Toma.

name: Bronk's Ingot
description: An ingot to be given  to Chief Blacksmith  Bronk.

name: Shari's Axe
description: An axe to be given to  Trader Cha-Li.

name: Zimenf's Potion
description: A potion to give to  priest Zimenf of the  earth.

name: Bronk's Pay
description: Product cost given by  Chief Blacksmith  Bronk. Take this to  Trader Mion.

name: Shari's Pay
description: Product cost given by  Cha-Li. Take this to  Trader Mion.

name: Zimenf's Pay
description: Product cost given by  Zimenf. Take this to  Trader Mion.

name: Bear Picture
description: A picture of bear  received by Master  Toma. Take this to  hunt hunter bears,  then honey bear will  appear.

name: Tarantula Picture
description: A picture of spider  received by Master  Toma. Use this to  hunt tarantulas.

name: Honey Jar
description: A honey jar taken  from a honey bear.  Collect five and take  them to Master Toma.

name: Bead
description: A bead obtained from  tarantula. Gather  twenty of these and  give to Master Toma.

name: Bead Parcel
description: A parcel made of  beads.  Give this to  Blacksmith Rout of  Gludin.

name: Gatekeeper Charm
description: Used to teleport from  the Orc Village to  the Gludin

name: Gatekeeper Token
description: Used to teleport from  the Dwarven Village  to Gludin

name: Cursed Maingauche
description: Cursed Maingauche.  Although its attack  power is weak, it  gives bleeding effect  with a certain rate  during critical  attacks

name: Scroll of Escape: Clan Hall
description: A scroll that  relocates you to your  hideaway. If you  don't have a  hideaway, it will  relocate you to the  nearest village.

name: Scroll of Escape: Castle
description: A scroll that  relocates you to your  castle. If you don't  have a castle, it  will relocate you to  the nearest village.

name: Antidote
description: A reagent that  neutralizes poison

name: Greater Antidote
description: A high-quality  reagent that  neutralizes powerful  poison

name: Bandage
description: A medical bandage  that stops bleeding  when injured

name: Emergency Dressing
description: A medical bandage  that stops bleeding  fast when severely  injured

name: Soulshot: No Grade
description: SoulShot of None  Grades

name: Kendell's Order 1
description: Punish Kaboo Chief  Uph. He should be  somewhere around the  ruins over the hill,  west of the Elven  village.

name: Kendell's Order 2
description: Punish Kaboo Chief  Kracha. He should be  somewhere around the  Nine obelisk,  southwest of the  Elven village.

name: Kendell's Order 3
description: Punish Kaboo Chief  Bhato. He should be  somewhere around the  entrance of the  underground fortress  of the Elves.

name: Kendell's Order 4
description: Punish Kaboo Chief  Tanukia. He should be  somewhere around the  open-air theatre  ruins, southwest of  the Elven village.

name: Kendell's Order 5
description: Punish Kaboo Chief  Turel. He should be  somewhere around the  seashore ruins,  northwest of Lake  Iris.

name: Kendell's Order 6
description: Punish Kaboo Chief  Rocco. He should be  somewhere around the  seashore ruins, west  of Lake Iris.

name: Kendell's Order 7
description: Punish Kaboo Chief  Kamut. He should be  somewhere around the  seashore ruins, south  of Lake Iris.

name: Kendell's Order 8
description: Punish Kaboo Chief  Murutika. He should  be somewhere around  the seashore ruins,  east of Lake Iris.

name: Kaboo Chief Torque1
description: A necklace taken by  killing the chief of  Kaboo orcs. Take this  to Sentinel  Kendnell.

name: Kaboo Chief Torque 2
description: A necklace taken by  killing the chief of  Kaboo orcs. Take this  to Sentinel  Kendnell.

name: Turek Dog Tag
description: A military  identification  necklace of Turek orc  fighters. Collect  these and take them  to Peotre for a  reward.

name: Turek Medallion
description: A necklace of Turek  orc officers. Collect  these and take them  to Piotre for a  reward.

name: Clay Urn Fragment
description: A relic of the  Elmoaden Empire. A  piece of a broken  clay urn.

name: Brass Trinket Piece
description: A relic of the  Elmoaden Empire. A  part of a brass  trinket.

name: Bronze Mirror Piece
description: A relic of the  Elmoaden Empire. A  part of a bronze  mirror.

name: Jade Necklace Bead
