name: Mark of Challenger
description: A mark given to those  who have passed the  Trial of the  Challenger. An item  for occupational  change.

name: Letter of Kash
description: Kash’s introduction  letter. Take this  letter to Martian in  Giran Castle Town.

name: Watchers Eye1
description: An item obtained from  the monster, Goru.  Take this to Martian  in Giran Castle Town.

name: Watchers Eye2
description: An item obtained from  the monster,  Baraham. Show this to  Raldo and...

name: Scroll of Shyslassy
description: An ancient scroll  obtained by slaying  Shyslassis. Take this  to Kash in Dion  Castle Town.

name: Broken Key
description: A key obtained by  slaying Shyslassis.  This key is needed in  order to open the  Chest of Shyslassis.

name: Mark of Duty
description: A mark given to those  who have passed the  Trial of Duty. An  item for occupational  change.

name: Letter of Dustin
description: A letter given by  Dustin. Deliver the  letter to Grandmaster  Hannavalt in Giran  Castle Town.

name: Knights Tear
description: Obtained from the  ghost of Sir Harrod.  Take this to Sir  Aaron Tanford.

name: Mirror of Orpic
description: This is needed in  order to speak with  the ghost of Sir  Talianus. Use this to  defeat the  hanged-man reaper.

name: Tear of Confession
description: Obtained from the  ghost of Sir  Talianus. Take this  to Sir Kiel  Nighthawk.

name: Report Piece
description: You may obtain this  by hunting strains  and ghouls. Gather 10  pieces and put them  together to create  Talianus’ Report.

name: Report Piece
description: The completed report.  After speaking with  Sir Kiel Nighthawk,  deliver the report to  the ghost of Sir  Talianus.

name: Tear of Loyalty
description: This item can be  obtained from Isael  Silvershadow. Take it  to Priest Dustin.

name: Militas Article
description: You can receive this  item when you catch a  Leto lizardman.  Collect 20 of them  and take them to  Isael Silvershadow.

name: Saints Ashes Urn
description: An object received  from Priest Dustin.  Deliver this to Sir  Windawood.

name: Athebaldt's Skull
description: You can obtain this  item from a Breka orc  overlord. Take it to  Priest Dustin along  with Athebaldt's ribs  and Athebaldt’s  shin.

name: Athebaldt's Ribs
description: You can obtain this  item from a Breka orc  overlord. Take it to  Priest Dustin along  with Athebaldt's  skull and Athebaldt’s  shin.

name: Athebaldt's Shin
description: You can obtain this  item from a Breka orc  overlord. Take it to  Priest Dustin along  with Athebaldt's ribs  and Athebaldt’s  skull.

name: Letter of Windawood
description: A letter received  from Sir Colin  Windawood. Show this  to Priest Dustin.

name: Dufners Letter
description: A letter sent from  Master Dufner to  Master Terry of Dion  Castle Town.

name: Terry's Order1
description: "Investigate the neer  crawler fraks of the  Execution Ground."

name: Terry's Order
description: “Investigate Ol Mahum  captain, Turek orc  warlord, ant captain  and Turak bugbear  warrior.”

name: Terry's Letter
description: A letter sent by  Master Terry to  Trader Viktor of the  Hunters’ Village.

name: Viktor's Letter
description: A letter sent by  Trader Viktor to  Master Terry of Dion  Castle Town. The  letter has Terry’s  seal.

name: Hawk Eye's Letter
description: A letter sent by  Hawkeye to Trader  Viktor of the  Hunters' Village.

name: Mysterious Runestone
description: A mysterious  runestone obtained  after slaying neer  crawler fraks. Take  this to Master Terry.

name: Ol Mahum Runestone
description: A mysterious  runestone obtained  after slaying the Ol  Mahum Captain. Take  this to Master Terry.

name: Turek Runestone
description: A mysterious  runestone obtained  after slaying the  Turek Orc Overlord.  Take this to Master  Terry.

name: Ant Runestone
description: A mysterious  runestone obtained  after slaying the Ant  Captain. Take this  to Master Terry.

name: Turak Bugbear Runestone
description: A mysterious  runestone obtained  after slaying the  Turak Bugbear  Warrior. Take this to  Master Terry.

name: Terry's Box
description: A chest containing  the mysterious  runestones. Take this  to Trader Viktor of  the Hunters’ Village.

name: Viktor's Request
description: A request issued by  Trader Viktor.  "Please gather 10  Medusa Scales."

name: Medusas Scales
description: The scales of the  medusa. Gather 10 of  these and take them  to Trader Viktor.

name: Silens Runestone
description: Strange runestones  obtained from the  bodies of mutant  species. They seem to  be related to  Shilen, the Goddess  of Death.

name: Analysis Request
description: A request letter sent  to Magister Marina  of the Ivory Tower  from Trader Viktor.  The letter asks  Marina to analyze the  Dark Bezoar.

name: Marinas Letter
description: A letter sent by  Magister Marina to  Blacksmith Bruno of  the Dwarven Village.

name: Experiment Tools
description: Experimental tools  crafted by Blacksmith  Bruno. Deliver these  to Magister Marina  of the Ivory Tower.

name: Analysis Result
description: A document where  Magister Marina has  organized the  analysis results of  the Dark Bezoar.  Deliver this to  Master Terry of Dion  Castle Town.

name: Terry's Order3
description: Master Terry’s  orders. The orders  give instructions to  come back for the  next task after  reaching level 36.

name: List of Host
description: A list of the bezoar  hosts. “Marsh stakato  drone, Breka Orc  Overlord, ant warrior  captain, Leto  Lizardman Warrior”

name: Abyss Runestone1
description: The Dark Bezoar  retrieved from the  body of a Breka Orc  Overlord. Take this  to Master Terry.

name: Abyss Runestone2
description: The runestone  retrieved from the  body of the Breka Orc  Overlord. Take this  to Master Terry.

name: Abyss Runestone3
description: The runestone  retrieved from the  body of the Ant  Captain. Take this to  Master Terry.

name: Abyss Runestone4
description: The runestone  retrieved from the  body of the Leto  Lizardman Warrior.  Take this to Master  Terry.

name: Terry's Report
description: A report detailing  information about the  runestone incident.  Take this to Master  Dufner of Giran  Castle Town.

name: Mark of Seeker
description: A mark given to those  who have passed the  Trial of the Seeker.  An occupation change  related item.

name: Mark of Scholar
description: A mark given to those  who have passed the  Trial of the Scholar.  An occupation change  related item.

name: Mirien's Sigil1
description: A mark given by  Magister Mirien while  giving orders to  complete High Priest  Sylvain’s request.

name: Mirien's Sigil2
description: A mark given by  Magister Mirien while  giving orders to  complete Grand  Sorcerer Jurek’s  request.

name: Mirien's Sigil3
description: A mark given by  Magister Mirien while  giving orders to  complete Sage Cronus’  request.

name: Mirien's Instruction
description: A note that contains  Magister Mirien’s  instructions.  The  note gives  instructions to come  back for the next  task after reaching  level 36.

name: Marya's Letter1
description: A letter sent by  Marya to Captain  Lucas of Dion Castle  Town.

name: Marya's Letter2
description: A letter sent by  Marya to Astrologer  Creta of the Village  of Floran.

name: Lucas's Letter
description: A letter sent by  Captain Lucas of Dion  Castle Town to  Marya.

name: Lucilla's Handbag
description: The handbag left by  Marya’s friend  Lucillas on the night  of the theft. Take  this to Astrologer  Creta.

name: Creta's Letter1
description: A letter sent by  Astrologer Creta to  Marya of Dion Castle  Town.

name: Creta's Painting1
description: A painting by  Astrologer Creta. It  contains a shadow  presumed to be that  of the thief. Take  this to Marya.

name: Creta's Painting2
description: A painting by  Astrologer Creta. It  contains a shadow  presumed to be that  of the thief. Take  this to Captain  Lucas.

name: Creta's Painting3
description: A painting painted by  Astrologer Creta.  The shadow in the  painting is that of a  Leto Lizardman  Warrior.

name: Brown Scroll Scrap
description: A scrap of a scroll  that contains  directions on how to  create the Crystal of  Purity. Gather 5 of  these and take them  to Marya.

name: Crystal of Purity1
description: A crystal used to  purify the earth.  Take this to High  Priest Sylvain of  Dion Castle Town.

name: High Priest's Sigil
description: A mark received from  High Priest Sylvain.  A proof given to  those who are  carrying out the  orders of the High  Priest.

name: Grand Magister's Sigil
description: A mark received from  Grand Sorcerer Jurek.  A proof given to  those who are  carrying out the  orders of the Grand  Magister.

name: Crono's Sigil
description: A mark received from  Sage Cronus. A proof  given to those who  are carrying out the  orders of Cronus.

name: Sylvain's Letter
description: High Priest Sylvain’s  letter. Take this  and go to Marya of  Dion Castle Town.

name: Symbol of Sylvain
description: A symbol given to  those who have passed  High Priest  Sylvain’s test. Take  this to Magister  Mirien of Dion Castle  Town.

name: Jurek's List
description: The list of evil  creatures that Grand  Magister Jurek asked  you to investigate:  Monster Eye  Destroyer, Breka Orc  Shaman, and Shackle

name: Monster Eye Destroyer Skin
description: A beamer’s skin.  Gather 5 of these and  take them to Grand  Sorcerer Jurek of  Giran Castle Town.

name: Shaman's Necklace
description: A Breka orc shaman’s  necklace. Gather 5 of  these and take them  to Grand Magister  Jurek in Giran Castle  Town.

name: Shackle's Scalp
description: Skin of the shackle’s  head. Gather 2 of  these and take them  to Grand Magister  Jurek of Giran Castle  Town.

name: Symbol of Jurek
description: A symbol given to  those who have passed  Grand Sorcerer  Jurek’s test. Take  this to Magister  Mirien of Dion Castle  Town.

name: Crono's Letter
description: A letter sent by Sage  Cronus to Magister  Dieter of Dion Castle  Town.

name: Dieter's Key
description: A key to the chest  where Dieter has  hidden the Scripture  of Knowledge. Take  this to Astrologer  Creta at the Village  of Floran.

name: Creta's Letter2
description: Creta’s letter  informing the theft  of the Scripture of  Knowledge. Take this  to Magister Dieter at  Giran Castle Town.

name: Dieter's Letter
description: A letter from  Magister Dieter to  Trader Edroc of the  weapons shop of  Hunter’s Village.

name: Dieter's Diary
description: Magister Dieter’s  diary, given by  himself in hopes that  it may be of aid in  recovering the  Scripture of  Knowledge.

name: Raut's Letter Envelope
description: A plain letter  envelope with no  contents. The  envelope is addressed  "To Warehouse Keeper  Raut”.

name: Treaf's Ring
description: A ring given by  Drunkard Treaf. Show  this ring to the  friends to whom Treaf  has entrusted the  Scripture of  Knowledge.

name: Scripture Chapter 1
description: The 1st book of the  Scripture of  Knowledge. Gather all  4  books.

name: Scripture Chapter 2
description: The 2nd book of the  Scripture of  Knowledge. Gather all  4 books.

name: Scripture Chapter 3
description: The 3rd book of the  Scripture of  Knowledge. Gather all  4 books.

name: Scripture Chapter 4
description: The 4th book of the  Scripture of  Knowledge. Gather all  4 books.

name: Valkon's Request
description: Warehouse Keeper  Valkon's request. The  instructions are to  bring back the  Crystal of Purity.

name: Poitan's Notes
description: Blacksmith Poitan’s  account books. Take  this to Sage Kasian  of the Wastelands.

name: Scripture of Knowledge
description: A scripture edited by  Sage Cronus. It is  said to contain all  the knowledge of the  past. It is comprised  of a total of 4  books.

name: Strong Liquor
description: As its name  indicates, a strong  liquor. Take this to  Drunkard Treaf at the  harbor.

name: Crystal of Purity2
description: An item that  Warehouse Keeper  Valkon in Giran  Castle Town agreed to  trade with you for  scripture chapter 2.

name: Kasian's List
description: 10 Ghoul’s Skins, 12  units of Medusa’s  Blood, 5 units of  Fettered Soul's  Ichor, and 5  Enchanted Gargoyle's  Nails.

name: Ghoul's Skin
description: The skin of a ghoul.  Gather 10 of these  and take them to Sage  Kasian.

name: Medusa's Blood
description: Medusa blood. Gather  12 bottles and take  them to Sage Kasian.

name: Fettered Soul's Ichor
description: The ichor of a  Crimson Bind. Gather  5 units and take them  to Sage Kasian.

name: Enchted Gargoyle's Nail
description: The enchanted nails  of a gargoyle. Gather  5 of these and take  them to Sage Kasian.

name: Symbol of Cronos
description: The mark of Cronus,  the top sage of the  continent. Take this  to Magister Mirien at  Dion Castle Town.

name: Mark of Pilgrim
description: A mark given to those  who have passed the  Trial of the Pilgrim.  An occupation change  related item.

name: Book of Sage
description: A book given by Sage  Kasian. Take this  book to Hermit  Santiago.

name: Voucher of Trial
description: A mark given by  Hermit Santiago. Show  this to Seer Tanapi  of the Orc Village.

name: Spirit of Flame
description: Proof that you have  an understanding of  the Spirit of Flame.  In order to carry out  the next stage of  this trial, go see  Gauri Twinklerock of  Dwarven Village.

name: Essense of Flame
description: A jewel obtained from  the Lava Salamander.  Take this to the  Ancestor Martankus.

name: Book of Gerald
description: A book given by  Priest Gerald. The  book looks very  cheap.

name: Gray Badge
description: A badge given by  Wanderer Dorf. Take  this to Father Prim  at Giran Castle Town.

name: Picture of Nahir
description: A picture of the  monster,  Nahir.  Defeat Nahir, who  lurks in the depths  of the Elven Ruins on  Talking Island.

name: Hair of Nahir
description: The hair of the  monster,  Nahir. Take  this to Priest  Potter.

name: Statue of Einhasad
description: A statue of Einhasad  given by Priest  Potter. Take this to  Andellia, who lives  near the Mothertree  Glade in the Elven  Village.

name: Book of Darkness
description: A book given by  Uruha. The book  contains  unrecognizable  letters written in  blood.

name: Debris of Willow
description: Debris obtained from  the black willow. Go  and seek Uruha while  in possession of  this.

name: Tag of Rumor
description: This contains rumors  regarding Wanderer  Dorf and Priest  Gerald.

name: Mark of Trust
description: A mark given to those  who have passed the  Testimony of Trust.  An occupation change  related item.

name: Letter to Elf
description: A letter requesting  the trust of the  Elves. Deliver this  to Hierarch Asterios  of the Elven Village.

name: Letter to Darkelf
description: A letter requesting  the trust of the Dark  Elves. Deliver this  to Tetrarch Thifiell  of the Dark Elven  Village.

name: Letter to Dwarf
description: A letter requesting  the trust of the  Dwarves. Deliver this  to First Elder  Lockirin of the  Dwarven Village.

name: Letter to Orc
description: A letter requesting  the trust of the  Orcs. Deliver this to  Paagrio Lord Kakai  of the Orc Village.

name: Letter to Seresin
description: A letter given by  High Priest Hollint.  Deliver this to  Cardinal Seresin at  the Town of Oren.

name: Scroll of Darkelf Trust
description: A scroll given by  Tetrarch Thifiell.  Deliver this, along  with the Scroll of  the Elven Trust, to  High Priest Hollint.

name: Scroll of Elf Trust
description: This item can be  obtained from  Hierarch Asterios.  Give this item along  with Scroll of Dark  Elf Trust to High  Priest Hollint.

name: Scroll of Dwarf Trust
description: A scroll given by  First Elder Lockirin.  Deliver this, along  with the Scroll of  the Orcs' Trust, to  Cardinal Seresin.

name: Scroll of Orc Trust
description: A scroll given by  Kakai The Lord of  Flame. Deliver this,  along with the Scroll  of the Dwarven  Trust, to Cardinal  Seresin.

name: Recommendation of Hollin
description: Deliver this to High  Priest Biotin at the  Temple of Einhasad on  Talking Island.

name: Order of Ozzy
description: "Slay Luel of Zephyr  and Aktea of the  Woods and bring back  proof of their  deaths."

name: Breath of Winds
description: Obtained from Luel of  Zephyr. Deliver  this, along with the  Seed of Verdure to  Hierarch Asterios.

name: Seed of Verdure
description: A proof obtained from  Aktea of the Woods.  Deliver this, along  with the Breath of  Winds, to Hierarch  Asterios.

name: Letter of Thifiell
description: Deliver this to  Magister Clayton of  the Dark Elven Guild  at Dion Castle Town.

name: Blood of Guardian Basilisk
description: This may be obtained  from the guardian  basilisk. Gather 10  to create the  Basilisk Plasma.

name: Giant Aphid
description: This may be obtained  from various soldier  ants. Gather 10 to  create the Honey Dew.

name: Stakatos Fluids
description: This may be obtained  from various marsh  stakatos. Gather 10  to create Stakato  Ichor.

name: Basilisk Plasma
description: Take this, along with  the Honey Dew and  Stakato Ichor, to  Magister Clayton.

name: Honey Dew
description: Take this, along with  the Basilisk Plasma  and Stakato Ichor, to  Magister Clayton.

name: Stakato Ichor
description: Take this, along with  the Honey Dew and  Basilisk Plasma, to  Magister Clayton.

name: Order of Clayton
description: "Obtain Basilisk  Plasma, Stakato  Ichor, and Honey Dew  and deliver them to  Magister Clayton."

name: Parasite of Lota
description: This may be obtained  from the wyndsus.  Gather 10 of these  and take them to Seer  Manakia.

name: Letter to Manakia
description: A letter received  from Paagrio Lord  Kakai. Deliver this  to Seer Manakia of  Giran Castle Town.

name: Letter of Manakia
description: A letter received  from Seer Manakia.  Deliver this to  Paagrio Lord Kakai.

name: Letter to Nikola
description: A letter received  from First Elder  Lockirin. Deliver  this to Maestro  Nikola of the Cruma  Tower.

name: Order of Nikola
description: "Obtain 10 Porta  Heartstones and take  them to Maestro  Nichola."

name: Heart of Porta
description: This may be obtained  from a porta. Gather  10 of these and take  them to Maestro  Nikola.

name: Mark of Duelist
description: A mark given to those  who have passed the  Trial of the Duelist.  An item for  occupational change.

name: Order Gludio
description: "Defeat both the  puncher and the noble  ant leader 10 or  more times in the  lands of Gludio."

name: Order Dion
description: "Defeat both the  marsh stakato drone  and dead seeker 10 or  more times in the  lands of Dion."

name: Order Giran
description: In Giran, slay a  Breka orc overlord  and fettered soul ten  or more times each.

name: Order Oren
description: "Defeat both the Leto  Lizardman Chief and  tempered monster eye  10 or more times in  the lands of Oren."

name: Order Aden
description: "Defeat the Tamrin  Orc and Tamrin Orc  Archer 10 or more  times in the lands of  Aden."

name: Puncher's Shard
description: A shard of the broken  puncher. Collect 10  of these to take to  Duelist Kaien.

name: Noble Ant's Feeler
description: The feelers of the  Noble Ant Leader.  Collect 10 of these  to take to Duelist  Kaien.

name: Drone's Chitin
description: The chitin of the  marsh stakato drone.  Collect 10 of these  to take to Duelist  Kaien.

name: Dead Seeker Fang
description: The fangs of the Dead  Seeker bat. Collect  10 of these to take  to Duelist Kaien.

name: Overlord Necklace
description: Collect ten Breka orc  overlord’s necklaces  and take them to  Duelist Kaien.

name: Fettered Soul's Chain
description: The chains that  surround a crimson  bind’s body. Collect  10 of these to take  to Duelist Kaien.

name: Chief's Amulet
description: The amulet of a Leto  Lizardman Chief.  Collect 10 of these  to take to Duelist  Kaien.

name: Tempered Eye Meat
description: The flesh of a  Tempered Eye. Collect  10 of these to take  to Duelist Kaien.

name: Tamrin Orc's Ring
description: The ring of a Tamrin  Orc. Collect 10 of  these to take to  Duelist Kaien.

name: Tamrin Orc's Arrow
description: The arrows of a  Tamrin Orc Archer.  Collect 10 of these  to take to Duelist  Kaien.

name: Final Order
description: Defeat the excuro and  krator of the Cruma  Tower, the grandis of  Giran, the Timak Orc  Overlord of Oren,  and the rakin of Aden  3 times.

name: Excuro's Skin
description: The skin of the  excuro.  Collect 3 of  these to take to  Duelist Kaien.

name: Krator's Shard
description: The shard of a broken  krator. Collect 3 of  these to take to  Duelist Kaien.

name: Grandi's Skin
description: The skin of a  grandis. Collect 3 of  these to take to  Duelist Kaien.

name: Timak Orc's Belt
description: The belt of a Timak  Orc Overlord. Collect  3 of these to take  to Duelist Kaien.

name: Rakin's Mace
description: Mace used by a rakin.  Collect 3 of these  to take to Duelist  Kaien.

name: Luther's Letter
description: A letter given by  Master Luther. Take  this to Alex of the  Village of Floran.

name: Alex's Warrant
description: A warrant written by  Alex. Take this to  Leirynn.

name: Leirynn's Order1
description: A list of orders  given by Leirynn.  "Slay 10 Delu Shamans  and bring back   tokens."

name: Delu Totem
description: The totem of Shaman  Saska. Take this,  along with the rest  of the Delu Shamans’  totems, to Leirynn.

name: Leirynn's Order2
description: A list of orders  given by Leirynn.  Slay Delu Chief  Kalkis and bring back  proof.

name: Chief Kalki's Fang
description: Proof that the Delu  Chief Kalkis has been  slain. Take this to  Leirynn.

name: Leirynn's Report
description: A report issued by  Leirynn. Take this to  Alex.

name: Strange Map
description: A strange map  obtained from the  Delu chief Kalkis.

name: Lambert's Map
description: A map where the name  of Lambert, the  former Lord's guard,  is written.

name: Alex's Letter
description: A letter given by  Alex. Take this and  go to Drunkard Borys  at Gludio Castle  Town.

name: Alex's Order
description: Alex’s orders. The  orders give  instructions to find  and recover Duke  Ashton’s missing  gold.

name: Wine Catalog
description: A list of premium  wine published by the  Giran Traders'  Guild. Show this to  Trader Tweety.

name: Tyra's Contract
description: The contract that  Trader Tweety has  drawn up. The  contract states that  Tweety will trade 10  pouches of Red Spore  Dusts for a Malrukian  Wine.

name: Red Spore Dust
description: Red Spore Dust  obtained by slaying  the giant fungus.  Gather 10 pouches and  bring them to Trader  Tweety.

name: Malrukian Wine
description: Premium wine crafted  following the methods  of the Malruk tribe.  Take this to  Drunkard Borys.

name: Old Order
description: An old order received  from Drunkard Borys.  Take this and go to  Bodyguard Jax.

name: Jax's Diary
description: A diary that  Bodyguard Jax has  given, saying that it  will aid in the  search for Solt's and  Makel’s maps.

name: Torn Map Piece1
description: A piece of the map  that belonged to the  former Lord’s guard  Solt. Gather 4 of  these.

name: Torn Map Piece2
description: A piece of the map  that belonged to the  former Lord’s guard  Makel. Gather 4 of  these.

name: Solt's Map
description: A map where the name  of the former Lord’s  guard Solt is  written.

name: Makel's Map
description: A map where the name  of the former Lord’s  guard Makel is  written.

name: Combined Map
description: Map – Use the Aden  Item to confirm the  location of the  Lord’s gold.

name: Rusted Key1
description: A rusty copper key  discovered while  digging under the  tree indicated on the  map.

name: Gold Bar
description: A gold bar stamped  with Duke Ashton’s  seal. Take this to  Alex.

name: Alex's Recommend
description: A recommendation  written by Alex. Take  this to Master  Luther.

name: Mark of Searcher
description: A mark given to those  who have passed the  Trial of the  Searcher. An  occupation change  related item.

name: Report of Perrin
description: Take this report and  go seek Perrin in  Gludin Harbor.

name: Cristina's Letter
description: A letter given by  Saintess Kristina.  Deliver this to  Master Sorius.

name: Picture of Windy
description: A picture of Windy.  Take this drawing to  Windy.

name: Golden Statue
description: The reward given by  the head of the  orphanage. Something  good happens if this  is in possession?

name: Windy's Pebbles
description: A pebble that Windy  has picked up from  the Wastelands. Take  this to Goop, the  head of the orphanage  near Gludio.

name: Order of Sorius
description: Take these orders and  show them to Daurin,  who is located west  of the Orc Barracks.

name: Secret Letter1
description: The documents of Leto  Lizardmen. Gather  all of the letters  and deliver them to  Saintess Kristina.

name: Secret Letter2
description: The documents of Leto  Lizardmen. Gather  all of the letters  and deliver them to  Saintess Kristina.

name: Secret Letter3
description: The documents of Leto  Lizardmen. Gather  all of the letters  and deliver them to  Saintess Kristina.

name: Secret Letter4
description: The documents of Leto  Lizardmen. Gather  all of the letters  and deliver them to  Saintess Kristina.

name: Mark of Healer
description: A mark given to those  who have passed the  Test of the Healer.  An occupation change  related item.

name: Mark of Reformer
description: A mark given to those  who have passed the  Trial of the  Reformer. An  occupation change  related item.

name: Book of Reform
description: A book received from  Priestess Rupino. Go  to the Execution  Ground and slay the  nameless undeads with  the Power of Light.

name: Letter of Introduction
description: A letter of  introduction given by  Priestess Ruipino.  Take this and go to  Preacher Sla of the  Wastelands.

name: Sla's Letter
description: A letter given by  Sla. Take this to  Katari, who is near  the waterfalls of the  Neutral Zone.

name: Greetings
description: A letter sent by Sla  to his disciples. Go  to the Orc Village,  Dwarven Village, and  Talking Island in  this order.

name: Ol Mahum's Money
description: Ol Mahum currency  given by the  themselves as a  reward. For what...?  Nobody knows.

name: Katari's Letter
description: A reply letter sent  by Katari to Sla.  Deliver this to Sla  after meeting all of  Sla’s disciples.

name: Nyakuri's Letter
description: A reply letter sent  by Nyakuri to Sla.  Deliver this to Sla  after meeting all of  Sla’s disciples.

name: Undead List
description: "Skeleton archer,  skeleton scout,  skeleton sniper,  thrill seeker, silent  horror"

name: Ramus's Letter
description: A reply letter sent  by Ramus to Sla.  Deliver this to Sla  after meeting all of  Sla’s disciples.

name: Ripped Diary
description: A testimony of the  women wrongfully  killed during Duke  Ashton’s ‘Witch  Hunt.’ Collect 7 of  these and...

name: Huge Nail
description: The large nail that  was embedded in  Aruraune’s skull.  Take this to  Priestess Rupino at  Giran Castle Town.

name: Letter of Betrayer
description: A letter given by an  Ol Mahum Betrayer.  Take it to Katari who  is located in the  swamp area of the  Dark Forest.

name: Bone Fragment4
description: Bone pieces of a  silent horror. Take  this, along with the  rest of the undead  bone fragments, to  Ramus.

name: Bone Fragment5
description: A bone fragment of a  skeleton scout. Take  this, along with the  rest of the undead  bone fragments, to  Ramus.

name: Bone Fragment6
description: A bone fragment of a  skeleton sniper. Take  this, along with the  rest of the undead  bone fragments, to  Ramus.

name: Bone Fragment7
description: A bone fragment of a  terror seeker. Take  this, along with the  rest of the undead  bone fragments, to  Ramus.

name: Bone Fragment8
description: A bone fragment of a  skeleton archer. Take  this, along with the  rest of the undead  bone fragments, to  Ramus.

name: Bone Fragment9
description: A bone fragment of a  skeleton. Take this,  along with the rest  of the undead bone  fragments, to Ramus.

name: Mark of Magus
description: A mark given to those  who have passed the  Trial of the Magus.  An item for  occupational change.

name: Rukal's Letter
description: A letter sent by Bard  Rukal to Parina of  the Village of  Gludin.

name: Parina's Letter
description: A letter sent by  Parina to the Sage  Kasian. The letter  makes inquiries  regarding the Singing  Flower.

name: Lilac Charm
description: A protection charm  created by the Sage  Kasian. Take this and  seek out 3 types of  Singing Flowers.

name: Golden Seed1
description: The seed of the  Singing Flower, which  absorbs blood in  order to bloom.  Gather 3 of these and  take them to Bard  Rukal.

name: Golden Seed2
description: The seed of the  Singing Flower, which  absorbs blood in  order to bloom.  Gather 3 of these and  take them to Bard  Rukal.

name: Golden Seed3
description: The seed of the  Singing Flower, which  absorbs blood in  order to bloom.  Gather 3 of these and  take them to Bard  Rukal.

name: Score of Elements
description: A music score sheet  given by Bard Rukal.  Take this and find  the 4 Elemental  Tones.

name: Dazzling Drop
description: A dazzling,  tear-shaped jewel.  Gather 20 of these  and take them to the  Water Undine.

name: Flame Crystal
description: A crystal obtained  from the ghost fire.  Gather 5 of these and  take them to the  Flame Salamander.

name: Harpy's Feather
description: The feather of a  slain harpy. Gather  20 of these and take  them to the Wind  Sylph.

name: Wyrm's Wingbone
description: The wingbone of a  slain wyrm. Gather 10  of these and take  them to the Wind  Sylph.

name: Windsu's Mane
description: The mane of a slain  windsus. Gather 10 of  these and take them  to the Wind Sylph.

name: En Monster Eye Shell
description: The skin of a slain  tempered eye. Gather  10 of these and take  them to the Earth  Snake.

name: En Stonegolem Powder
description: Stone powder obtained  after slaying the  enhanced stone golem.  Gather 10 of these  and take them to the  Earth Snake.

name: En Irongolem Scrap
description: A fragment of a  destroyed enhanced  iron golem. Gather 10  of these and take  them to the Earth  Snake.

name: Tone of Water
description: One of the notes that  comprise the  beautiful harmony of  the 4 elemental  tones. Take this to  Bard Rukal of Dion  Castle Town.

name: Tone of Fire
description: One that comprise the  beautiful harmony of  the four elemental  tones. Take this to  Bard Rukal of Dion  Castle Town.

name: Tone of Wind
description: One that comprise the  beautiful harmony of  the four elemental  tones. Take this to  Bard Rukal of Dion  Castle Town.

name: Tone of Earth
description: One that comprise the  beautiful harmony of  the four elemental  tones. Take this to  Bard Rukal of Dion  Castle Town.

name: Salamander Charm
description: A charm of agreement  given by the Flame  Salamander. It  promises to give the  Tone of Fire in  return for 5 Flame  Crystals.

name: Sylph Charm
description: A charm of agreement  given by the Wind  Sylph. It promises to  give the Tone of  Wind in return for  materials gathered  from the harpy, wyrm,  and windsus.

name: Undine Charm
description: A charm of agreement  given by the Water  Undine. It promises  to give the Tone of  Water in return for  20 Dazzling Drops.

name: Serpent Charm
description: A charm of agreement  given by the Earth  Snake. It promises to  give the Tone of  Earth in return for  slaying the enchanted  monsters in the  surroundings of the  Ivory Tower.

name: Recommendation of Balanki
description: A recommendation  given by Elder  Balanki. Gather all 3  recommendations and  visit First Elder  Lockirin.

name: Recommendation of Filaur
description: A recommendation  given by Elder  Filaur. Gather all 3  recommendations and  go to First Elder  Lockirin.

name: Recommendation of Arin
description: A recommendation  given by Elder Arin.  Gather all 3  recommendations and  go to First Elder  Lockirin.

name: Mark of Maestro
description: A mark given to those  who have passed the  Trial of the Maestro.  An occupation change  related item.

name: Letter of Solder Detachment
description: A letter from General  Kroto that promises  to send soldiers.  Deliver this to First  Elder Lockirin.

name: Paint of Kamuru
description: A painting of Kamuru.  Go to the Cave of  Trials in the Orc  Kingdom to seek him  out.

name: Necklace of Kamuru
description: A necklace worn by  Kamuru. Deliver this  to General Kroto.

name: Paint of Teleport Device
description: A drawing of a  teleport device.  Recover this device  from Master Toma.

name: Teleport Device
description: A teleport device  given by Master Toma.  Deliver this to  Elder Arin.

name: Architecture of Kruma
description: A simple explanation  of Cruman  architecture. Take  this to the research  team stationed at the  entrance of the  Cruma Tower.

name: Report of Kruma
description: A report recording  the results of  investigations made  by the Cruma  reasearch team.  Deliver this to Eldar  Filaur.

name: Ingredients of Antidote
description: Gather 10 Weird Bee  Needles, 10 Marsh  Spider Webs, and 10  Leech Bloods and  deliver them to  Researcher Loraine.

name: Stinger Wasp Needle
description: Gather 10 of these  and deliver them  along with the other  ingredients to  Researcher Loraine.

name: Marsh Spider's Web
description: Gather 10 of these  and deliver them  along with the other  ingredients to  Researcher Loraine.

name: Blood of Leech
description: Gather 10 of these  and deliver them  along with the other  ingredients to  Researcher Loraine.

name: Mark of Warspirit
description: A mark given to those  who have passed the  Test of the War  Spirit. An item for  occupational change.

name: Vendetta Totem
description: A totem given to the  Orcs who seek to  punish betrayers of  their race. Take this  and hunt the Tamlin  Orcs.

name: Tamlin Orc Head
description: The head of a slain  Tamlin Orc. Gather 13  of these and take  them to Seer Somak.

name: Warspirit Totem
description: A totem used in the  Ritual of the War  Spirit. Take this to  Ancestor Martankus in  the Cave of Trials.

name: Orim's Contract
description: "I will give you  Braki’s remains in  return for ten each  of Porta Eyes, Excuro  Scales, and Mordeo  Talons."

name: Porta's Eye
description: A jewel pried from  the porta’s eye.  Gather 10 of these  and take them to Orim  of the Shadow.

name: Excuro's Scale
description: The scales of an  excuro. Gather 10 of  these and take them  to Orim of the  Shadow.

name: Mordeos Talon
description: The talons of a  mordeo. Gather 10 of  these and take them  to Orim of the  Shadow.

name: Braki's Remains1
description: The remains of Braki,  an ancient Orc hero.  Take this, along  with the additional 3  remains, to Seer  Somak.

name: Pekiron's Totem
description: A guardian totem  received from Seer  Pekiron. Take this  and go to the Leto  Lizardman Shamans and  Chiefs to recover  Tonar’s Remains.

name: Tonar's Skull
description: The skull of Tonar,  an ancient Orc hero.  Take this, along with  the additional 4  remains, to Seer  Pekiron.

name: Tonar's Rib Bone
description: The rib bones of  Tonar, an ancient Orc  hero. Take this,  along with the  additional 4 remains,  to Seer Pekiron.

name: Tonar's Spine
description: The spine bones of  Tonar, an ancient Orc  hero. Take this,  along with the  additional 4 remains,  to Seer Pekiron.

name: Tonar's Arm Bone
description: The arm bones of  Tonar, an ancient Orc  hero. Take this,  along with the  additional 4 remains,  to Seer Pekiron.

name: Tonar's Thigh Bone
description: The thigh bones of  Tonar, an ancient Orc  hero. Take this,  along with the  additional 4 remains,  to Seer Pekiron.

name: Tonar's Remains1
description: The remains of Tonar,  an ancient Orc hero.  Take this, along  with the other 3  heros’ remains, to  Seer Somak.

name: Manakia's Totem
description: A totem received from  Seer Manakia. Take  this and go to the  medusas and Stenoa,  the Gorgon Queen, to  recover Hermodt’s  remains.

name: Hermodt's Skull
description: The skull of Hermodt,  an ancient Orc hero.  Take this, along  with the additional 4  remains, to Seer  Manakia.

name: Hermodt's Rib Bone
description: The rib bones of  Hermodt, an ancient  Orc hero. Take this,  along with the  additional 4 remains,  to Seer Manakia.

name: Hermodt's Spine
description: The spine bones of  Hermodt, an ancient  Orc hero. Take this,  along with the  additional 4 remains,  to Seer Manakia.

name: Hermodt's Arm Bone
description: The arm bones of  Hermodt, an ancient  Orc hero. Take this,  along with the  additional 4 remains,  to Seer Manakia.

name: Hermodt's Thigh Bone
description: The thigh bones of  Hermodt, an ancient  Orc hero. Take this,  along with the  additional 4 remains,  to Seer Manakia.

name: Hermodt's Remains1
description: The remains of  Hermodt, an ancient  Orc hero. Take this,  along with the other  three heros’ remains,  to Seer Somak.

name: Racoy's Totem
description: A totem given by Seer  Racoy. Take this and  go to the Temple of  Einhasad in Gludio  Castle Town to ask  about Kiruna.

name: Vivyan's Letter
description: A letter by Priestess  Vyvyan’s. Take this  to Trader Sal of the  southern Wastelands.

name: Insect Diagram Book
description: An insect  encyclopedia that  Trader Sal has given  as aid. Take this and  hunt noble ants to  recover Kiruna’s  remains.

name: Kiruna's Skull
description: The skull of Kiruna,  an ancient Orc hero.  Take this, along with  the additional 4  remains, to Seer  Racoy.

name: Kiruna's Rib Bone
description: The rib bones of  Kiruna, an ancient  Orc hero. Take this,  along with the  additional 4 remains,  to Seer Racoy.

name: Kiruna's Spine
description: The spine bones of  Kiruna, an ancient  Orc hero. Take this,  along with the  additional 4 remains,  to Seer Racoy.

name: Kiruna's Arm Bone
description: The arm bones of  Kiruna, an ancient  Orc hero. Take this,  along with the  additional 4 remains,  to Seer Racoy.

name: Kiruna's Thigh Bone
description: The thigh bones of  Kiruna, an ancient  Orc hero. Take this,  along with the  additional 4 remains,  to Seer Racoy.

name: Kiruna's Remains1
description: The remains of  Kiruna, an ancient  Orc hero. Take this,  along with the other  3 heros’ remains, to  Seer Somak.

name: Braki's Remains2
description: The remains of the  hero, Braki, encased  in an urn. Take this  to the Ancestor  Martankus in the Cave  of Trials.

name: Tonar's Remains2
description: The remains of the  hero, Tonar, encased  in an urn. Take this  to the Ancestor  Martankus in the Cave  of Trials.

name: Hermodt's Remains2
description: The remains of the  hero, Hermodt,  encased in an urn.  Take this to the  Ancestor Martankus in  the Cave of Trials.

name: Kiruna's Remains2
description: The remains of the  hero, Kiruna, encased  in an urn. Take this  to the Ancestor  Martankus in the Cave  of Trials.

name: Old Knight Sword
description: Use this sword to  deliver the final  blow to the spirit of  Sir Harrod.

name: Broken Teleport Device
description: The teleport device  given by Master Toma.  Take this back to  Master Toma.

name: Ring of Binding Gemstone
description: A key material for  Dwarves to make a  Ring of Binding. Can  be sold in the shop.

name: Mithril Scale Gaiters Material
description: A key material for  Dwarves to make  Mithril Scale  Gaiters. Can be sold  in the shop.

name: Brigandine Gaiters Material
description: A key material for  Dwarves to make  Brigandine Gaiters.  Can be sold in the  shop.

name: Elven Mithril Tunic Pattern
description: A key material for  Dwarves to make a  Elven Mithril Tunic.  Can be sold in the  shop.

name: Elven Mithril Stockings Pattern
description: A key material for  Dwarves to make a  Elven Mithril Hose.  Can be sold in the  shop.

name: Brigandine Helmet Design
description: A key material for  Dwarves to make a  Brigandine Helmet.  Can be sold in the  shop.

name: Manticore Skin Boot Lining
description: A key material for  Dwarves to make  Manticor Skin Boots.  Can be sold in the  shop.

name: Brigandine Boots Design
description: A key material for  Dwarves to make  Brigandine Boots. Can  be sold in the shop.

name: Elven Mithril Boots Design
description: A key material for  Dwarves to make Elven  Mithril Boots. Can  be sold in the shop.

name: Manticore Skin Gloves Lining
description: A key material for  Dwarves to make  Manticor Skin Gloves.  Can be sold in the  shop.

name: Brigandine Gauntlets Pattern
description: A key material for  Dwarves to make a  Brigandine Gauntlet.  Can be sold in the  shop.

name: Elven Mithril Gloves Design
description: A key material for  Dwarves to make Elven  Mithril Gloves. Can  be sold in the shop.

name: Brigandine Shield Fragment
description: A key material for  Dwarves to make a  Brigandine Shield.  Can be sold in the  shop.

name: Plate Helmet Design
description: A key material for  Dwarves to make a  Plate Helmet. Can be  sold in the shop.

name: Salamander Skin Boot Lining

name: Mark of Guildsman
description: A mark given to those  who have passed the  Trial of the  Guildsman. An  occupation change  related item.

name: Valkon's Recommendation
description: A recommendation  letter written by  Warehouse Keeper  Valkon. Take this and  go to Blacksmith  Allman of Talking  Island.

name: Mandragora Berry
description: The fruit of  mandragoras, known  for their uses in  treating ailments.

name: Altran's Instructions
description: Blacksmith Allman’s  instructions. The  instructions are to  gather materials and  create 7 Journeyman’s  Rings.

name: Altran's Recommend1
description: A recommendation  letter written by  Blacksmith Allman.  Take this and go to  Warehouse Keeper  Norman of the Village  of Gludin.

name: Altran's Recommend2
description: A recommendation  letter written by  Blacksmith Allman.  Take this and go to  Blacksmith Pinter of  Gludio Castle Town.

name: Norman's Instructions
description: Warehouse Keeper  Norman’s  instructions. The  instructions are to  go to Blacksmith  Duning of the  Hunters’ Village and  bring back the key.

name: Norman's Receipt
description: Warehouse Keeper  Norman’s receipt.  Take this and go to  Blacksmith Duning of  the Hunter’s Village.

name: Duning's Instructions
description: Blacksmith Duning’s  instructions. It  gives an order to  recover 30 keys from  Breka orcs.

name: Duning's Key
description: Mithril key recovered  from Breka orcs.  Collect 30 and take  them to Blacksmith  Dunning.

name: Norman's List
description: Ingredient list of  Warehouse Keeper  Norman: 70 Units of  Gray Bone Powder, 70  Granite Whetstones,  70 Units of Red  Pigment, and 70 Units  of Braided Yarn.

name: Gray Bone Powder
description: The powder collected  from the bones of  ghouls and strains.  Gather 70 of these  and take them to  Warehouse Keeper  Norman.

name: Granite Whetstone
description: A whetstone made from  the fragments of the  granite golem.  Gather 70 of these  and take them to  Warehouse Keeper  Norman.

name: Red Pigment
description: Red pigment obtained  by slaying the dead  seeker bat. Gather 70  of these and take  them to Warehouse  Keeper Norman.

name: Braided Yarn
description: Braided yarn obtained  by slaying the  silenos. Gather 70 of  these and take them  to Warehouse Keeper  Norman.

name: Journeyman Gem
description: A material used to  make the Journeyman’s  Ring.

name: Pinter's Instructions
description: Instructions of  Blacksmith Pinter:  Find and bring back  70 amber beads.

name: Amber Bead
description: A bead-shaped piece  of amber. Collect 70  of these and take  them to Blacksmith  Pinter.

name: Amber Lump
description: An unrefined lump of  amber. The material  used in creating the  amber bead.

name: Journeyman Deco Beads
description: Ingredient item that  is used to make a  journeyman’s ring.

name: Journeyman Ring
description: To pass the Trial of  the Guildsman, you  must create 7 of  these rings. Take the  completed rings to  Warehouse Keeper  Valkon.

name: Mark of Life
description: A mark given to those  who have passed the  Testimony of Life. An  occupation change  related item.

name: Cardien's Letter
description: Letter by Master  Cardien. Take this  and go to Hierarch  Asterios of the Elven  Village.

name: Camomile Charm
description: A talisman given by  Hierarch Asterios.  Take this and return  to Master Cardien of  Dion Castle Town.

name: Hierarch's Letter
description: A letter given by  Hierarch Asterios.  Take this and go to  Thalia, who lives on  the eastern shores of  Iris Lake.

name: Moonflower Charm
description: The charm given by  Hierarch Asterios to  keep in possession  while searching for  the Water of Life.

name: Grail Diagram
description: A diagram of the  grail, given by  Thalia. Take this and  go to Blacksmith  Pushkin of Giran  Castle Town.

name: Thalia's Letter 1
description: Thalya’s Letter. Take  this and go to  Arkenia, who is at  the Dark Elven  Initiation Altar.

name: Thalia's Letter 2
description: Thalia’s letter. Take  this and go to Isael  Silvershadow of the  Hunters’ Village.

name: Thalia's Instructions
description: A letter containing  Thalia’s  instructions. The  instructions are to  come back after  reaching level 38.

name: Pushkin's List
description: A list given by  Blacksmith Pushkin.  "10 Pure Mithril Ore,  20 Ant Soldier Acid,  20 Wyrm Talons"

name: Pure Mithril Cup
description: A cup crafted by  Blacksmith Pushkin  that is made of pure  mithril. Take this  back to Thalia.

name: Arkenia's Contract
description: A contract written by  Arkenia. The  contract states that  she will give the  Stardust in return  for Andariel’s Book  from the Village of  Gludin.

name: Arkenia's Instructions
description: Arkenia’s  instructions. The  instructions are to  bring back Andariel's  Book from the Temple  of Einhasad in the  Village of Gludin.

name: Adonius's list
description: A list given by  Priest Adonius: 20  Spider Ichor and 20  Harpy’s Down.

name: Andariel Scripture Copy
description: A copy of Andariel’s  Book given by Priest  Adonius. Take this  back to Arkenia.

name: Stardust
description: The silver dust  received from Arkenia  of the Dark Elves.  Take this back to  Thalia.

name: Isael's Instructions
description: A document containing  Isael Silvershadow’s  instructions. It  asks you to recover 6  pieces of talins  spear from leto  lizardman shamans.

name: Isael's Letter
description: A letter given by  Isael Silvershadow.  Take this back to  Thalia along with the  Talin’s Spear.

name: Grail of Purity
description: A grail crafted of  pure mithril. Catch  the Tears of the  Unicorn with the  grail and take it  back to Thalia.

name: Tears of Unicorn
description: The tears shed by  Eva’s unicorn when it  is killed with  Talin’s Spear. Take  this back to Thalia.

name: Water of Life
description: The holy water that  contains the powers  of life to rejuvenate  the Mothertree  Glade. Take this and  go to Hierarch  Asterios.

name: Pure Mithril Ore
description: The ore of pure  mithril. Gather 10 of  these, along with  the rest of the  ingredients, and take  them back to  Blacksmith Pushkin.

name: Ant Soldier Acid
description: The acid collected  from Ant Soldiers  after slaying them.  Gather 20 bottles of  this, along with the  rest of the  ingredients, and take  them back to  Blacksmith Pushkin.

name: Wyrm's Talon1
description: The talons of a wyrm  obtained after  slaying it. Gather 20  of these, along with  the rest of the  ingredients, and take  them back to  Blacksmith Pushkin .

name: Spider Ichor
description: The ichor of a marsh  spider. Gather 20  units of this and  take them back to  Priest Adonius.

name: Harpy's Down
description: The down feathers  obtained after  slaying a harpy.  Gather 20 of these  and take them back to  Priest Adonius.

name: Talin's Spear Blade
description: The blade portion of  Talin’s Spear. Take  this, along with the  remaining portions of  the spear, back to  Isael Silvershadow.

name: Talin's Spear Shaft
description: The shaft portion of  Talin’s Spear. Take  this, along with the  remaining portions of  the spear, back to  Isael Silvershadow.

name: Talin's Ruby
description: A decorative jewel  that adorned Talin’s  Spear. Take this,  along with the  remaining portions of  the spear, back to  Isael Silvershadow.

name: Talin's Aquamarine
description: A decorative jewel  that adorned Talin’s  Spear. Take this,  along with the  remaining portions of  the spear, back to  Isael Silvershadow.

name: Talin's Amethyst
description: A decorative jewel  that adorned Talin’s  Spear. Take this,  along with the  remaining portions of  the spear, back to  Isael Silvershadow.

name: Talin's Peridot
description: A decorative jewel  that adorned Talin’s  Spear. Take this,  along with the  remaining portions of  the spear, back to  Isael Silvershadow.

name: Mark of Fate
description: A mark given to those  who have passed the  Testimony of Fate. An  item for  occupational change.

name: Kaira's Letter1
description: A letter sent by  Magister Kaira to  Brother Metheus of  the Temple of  Einhasad. This must  be delivered  secretly.

name: Metheus's Funeral Jar
description: A jar for storing the  remains of the dead.  Take this to the  Execution Ground and  search for the  remains of  Metheus’  sister.

name: Kasandra's Remains
description: The remains of  Kasandra, Metheus’  sister. Take this  back to Brother  Metheus.

name: Herbalism Textbook
description: A textbook about  various herbs and  their uses. The book  contains information  about the poison  ‘Belladonna.'

name: Ixia's List
description: Medusa’s blood, marsh  spider fluids, dead  seeker’s dung,  tyrant's blood and  nightshade root. 10  (units) of each.”

name: Medusa's Ichor
description: The bottled blood of  a medusa. Collect 10  of these and take  them back to Master  Ixia

name: Marsh Spider Fluids
description: The bottled fluids of  a marsh spider.  Collect 10 of these  and take them back to  Master Ixia.

name: Dead Seeker Dung
description: The dung of dead  seeker bats. Collect  10 of these and take  them back to Master  Ixia.

name: Tyrant's Blood
description: The bottled blood of  Tyrant. Collect 10 of  these and take them  back to Master Ixia.

name: Nightshade Root
description: The roots of the rare  nightshade herb.  Collect 10 of these  and take them back to  Master Ixia.

name: Belladonna
description: A legendary poison  that can kill a bull  with a single drop.  Take this to Brother  Metheus.

name: Alder's Skull1
description: The skull of Alders,  who drafted the copy  of Kaysha’s  Revelations. Take  this to Magister  Kaira.

name: Alder's Skull2
description: Alder’s skull.  Deliver this to  ‘Roa,’ a distant  descendant of Alder.

name: Alder's Receipt
description: The receipt for the  item that Alder  entrusted to the  warehouse. Take this  and go to the  warehouse in the  Village of Gludin.

name: Revelations Manuscript
description: A copy of Kaysha’s  Revelations. Take  this to Magister  Kaira.

name: Kaira's Instructions
description: A note where Magister  Kaira’s instructions  are written. The  instructions are to  come back after  reaching level 38.

name: Kaira's Recommendation
description: A recommendation  letter written by  Magister Aira. Take  this and go to  Tetrarch Thifiell of  the Dark Elven  Village.

name: Palus Charm
description: A charm given by  Tetrarch Thifiell to  keep in possession  until the Initiation  Ceremony of the  Shilien Circle is  complete.

name: Thifiel's Letter
description: A letter from  Tetrarch Thifiell to  Arkenia. Arkenia is  at the Dark Elven  Initiation Altar.

name: Arkenia's Note
description: A note written by  Arkenia. It contains  instructions to bring  back Red Fairy Dust  and Ti-mi-riran Sap.

name: Pixy Garnet
description: A garnet given by the  bloody pixy as a  mark of promise.  Bring back 10 skulls  each from four  different races.

name: Grandis's Skull
description: The skull of a  Grandis. Collect ten  of these and take  them back to the  bloody pixy.

name: Karul Bugbear Skull
description: The skull of a Karul  Bugbear. Collect 10  of these and take  them back to the  bloody pixy.

name: Breka Overlord Skull
description: Skull of a Breka orc  overlord. Collect 10  of them and take them  to Bloody Pixy.

name: Leto Overlord Skull
description: The skull of a Leto  Lizardman Chief.  Collect 10 of these  and take them back to  the bloody pixy.

name: Red Fairy Dust
description: Red Fairy Dust given  by the bloody pixy.  Take this to Arkenia.

name: Blight Treant Seed
description: A seed given by  Ti-mi-riran as a mark  of promise. Slay the  black willow lurker  and bring back its  leaf.

name: Black Willow Leaf
description: A leaf obtained by  slaying the black  willow lurker. Take  this to Ti-mi-riran.

name: Blight Treant Sap
description: The sap of  Ti-mi-riran. Take  this to Arkenia.

name: Arkenia's Letter
description: A letter written by  Arkenia. It states  that the Initiation  Ceremony of the  Shilien Circle is  complete. Take this  to Tetrarch Thifiell.

name: Mark of Glory
description: A mark given to those  who have passed the  Testimony of Glory.  An item for  occupational change.

name: Vokian's Order
description: Collect and bring  back 10 of manashen  shards, tyrant  talons, and guardian  basilisk fangs  respectively.

name: Manashen Shard
description: A shard of the broken  Manashen. Collect 10  and take them back  to Prefect  Vokian.

name: Tyrant Talon
description: The talons plucked  from a slain Tyrant.  Collect 10 and take  them back to Prefect   Vokian.

name: Guardian Basilisk Fang
description: The fangs of a slain  Guardian Basilisk.  Collect 10 and take  them back to Prefect   Vokian.

name: Vokian's Order 2
description: Prefect Vokian’s  orders. The  instructions are to  go and seek out the  Gandi Chief Chianta  in Dion Castle Town.

name: Necklace of Authority
description: A symbol given to  those representing  Paagrio Lord Kakai.

name: Chiantas Order1
description: Orders of Gandi Chief  Chianta. The  instructions are to  go and recover the  Flame Scepter from  the lower Orc tribes.

name: Scepter of Breka
description: Scepter of flame  which can be obtained  from a Breka orc  chief. Take it along  with 4 other tribes’  scepters and go see  Gandi Chief Chianta.

name: Scepter of Enku
description: The flame scepter  received from the  Enku Orc Chief. Take  this, along with the  remaining 4 scepters,  to Gandi Chief  Chianta.

name: Scepter of Vuku
description: The flame scepter  received from the  Vuku Orc Chief. Take  this, along with the  remaining 4 scepters,  to Gandi Chief  Chianta.

name: Scepter of Turek
description: The flame scepter  received from the  Turek Orc Chief. Take  this, along with the  remaining 4  scepters, to Gandi  Chief Chianta.

name: Scepter of Tunath
description: The flame scepter  received from the  Lennunt Orc Chief.  Take this, along with  the remaining 4  scepters, to Gandi  Chief Chianta.

name: Chianta's Order2
description: Gandi Chief Chianta’s  orders. The  instructions are to  come back for further  orders after  reaching level 38.

name: Chianta's Order3
description: Gandi Chief Chianta’s  orders. The  instructions are to  bring back 20 each of  Timak and Tamlin Orc  heads.

name: Tamlin Orc Skull
description: The head of a Tamlin  Orc cut off after  being slain. Collect  20 of these and take  them to Gandi Chief  Chianta.

name: Timak Orc Head
description: The head of a Timak  Orc, cut off after  being slain. Collect  20 of these and take  them to Gandi Chief  Chianta.

name: Scepter Box
description: A box containing the  5 Flame Scepters  recovered from the  lesser Orc tribes.  Take this to Seer  Tanapi of the Orc  Village.

name: Pashika's Head
description: Kill Pashika, son of  Voltar, cut his head  off and show it to  Breka Chief Voltar.

name: Vultus' Head
description: Kill Vultus, son of  Voltar, cut his head  off and show it to  Breka Chief Voltar.

name: Glove of Voltar
description: Glove that was thrown  out by Breka Chief  Voltar. Slay Pashika  and Vultus, sons of  Voltar.

name: Enku Overlord Head
description: The head of an Enku  Overlord, cut off  after being slain.  Show this to Enku  Chief Kepra.

name: Glove of Kepra
description: The glove thrown down  by Enku Chief Kepra.  Go and slay the Enku  Overlords.

name: Makum Bugbear Head
description: The head of a Makum  Bugbear Warrior, cut  off after being  slain. Show this to  Turek Chief Burai.

name: Glove of Burai
description: The glove thrown down  by Turek Chief  Burai. Go and slay  the Makum Bugbear  Warriors.

name: Manakia's Letter
description: Letter of Seer  Manakia. Take it to  Breka orc chief.

name: Manakia's Letter2
description: Seer Manakia’s  letter. Take this and  go to the Enku Orc  Chief.

name: Kasman's Letter1
description: Prefect Kasman’s  letter. Take this and  go to the Vuku Orc  Chief.

name: Kasman's Letter2
description: Prefect Kasman’s  letter. Take this and  go to the Turek Orc  Chief.

name: Kasman's Letter3
description: Prefect Kasman’s  letter. Take this and  go to the Lennunt  Orc Chief.

name: Driko's Contract
description: Vuku Chief Driko’s  contract. The  contract contains  instructions to hunt  the marsh stakato  drones in the Cruma  Marshlands.

name: Stakato Drone Husk1
description: The husks of a marsh  stakato drone.  Collect 30 of these  and take them to Vuku  Chief Driko.

name: Tanapi's Order1
description: Seer Tanapi’s orders.  Hunt the Lennunt Orc  Chief and seers and  recover the Scepter  of Tantos.

name: Scepter of Tantos
description: The Flame Scepter of  the now-perished  Tantos tribe. Take  this to Seer Tanapi.

name: Ritual Box
description: The box containing  the scepters  recovered from the  lower Orcs and the  Tantos tribe scepter.  Take this to Paagrio  Lord Kakai.

name: Mark of Prosperity
description: A mark given to those  who have passed the  Testimony of  Prosperity. An  occupation change  related item.

name: Ring of Testimony1
description: A ring given to those  Dwarves attempting  the Testimony of  Prosperity. Find the  4 Proofs of  Prosperity.

name: Ring of Testimony2
description: A ring given to those  Dwarves attempting  the Testimony of  Prosperity. Find  Maphr’s Tablet, which  contains the  ultimate secrets of  geometry.

name: Old Account Book
description: First Elder  Lockirin’s account  book. The proof of  wealth. Take this to  Warehouse Keeper  Parman of Giran  Castle Town.

name: Blessed Seed
description: A seed containing the  blessings of Maphr.  The proof of fertile  lands. Take this to  Warehouse Keeper  Parman of Giran  Castle Town.

name: Emily's Recipe
description: A recipe good for  childbirth and  childbirth recovery.  The proof of  fertility. Take this  to Warehouse Keeper  Parman of Giran  Castle Town.

name: Lilith's Eleven Water
description: Food regarded as the  secret to the Elves’  longevity. The proof  of health. Take this  to Warehouse Keeper  Parman of Giran  Castle Town.

name: Maphr Tablet Fragment
description: A fragment of Maphr’s  Tablet, which  contains the ultimate  secrets of geometry.  Take this to  Warehouse Keeper  Parman of Giran  Castle Town.

name: Collection License
description: A license that allows  the bearer to  collect guild  contributions. Seek  out those who still  owe contributions and  collect the funds  from them.

name: Lockirin's Notice1
description: A notice that guild  contributions are  due. Take this to  Elder Spiron.

name: Lockirin's Notice2
description: A notice that guild  contributions are  due. Take this to  Elder Valanki.

name: Lockirin's Notice3
description: A notice that guild  contributions are  due. Take this to  Elder Keef.

name: Lockirin's Notice4
description: A notice that guild  contributions are  due. Take this to  Elder Filaur.

name: Lockirin's Notice5
description: A notice that guild  contributions are  due. Take this to  Elder Arin.

name: Contribution of Shari
description: Trader Charly’s guild  contribution. Take  this to Elder Spiron.

name: Contribution of Mion
description: Trader Mion’s guild  contribution. Take  this to Elder  Valanki.

name: Contribution of Maryse
description: Maryse Redbonnet’s  guild contribution.   Take this to Elder  Valanki.

name: Maryse's Request
description: The note containing  Maryse Redbonnet’s  request. The  instructions are to  bring back 100 Animal  Skins. Animal Skins  are a manufacturing  ingredient item.

name: Contribution of Toma
description: Master Toma’s guild  contribution. Take  this to Elder Keef.

name: Receipt of Bolter
description: Miner Bolter’s  contribution receipt.  Take this to Elder  Arin to confirm if  Miner Bolter has  already submitted his  contribution.

name: Receipt of Contribution1
description: The contribution  receipt received from  Elder Spiron.  Collect 5 receipts  and take them to  First Elder Lockirin.

name: Receipt of Contribution2
description: The contribution  receipt received from  Elder Valanki.  Collect 5 receipts  and take them to  First Elder Lockirin.

name: Receipt of Contribution3
description: The contribution  receipt received from  Elder Keef. Collect  5 receipts and take  them to First Elder  Lockirin.

name: Receipt of Contribution4
description: The contribution  receipt received from  Elder Filaur.  Collect 5 receipts  and take them to  First Elder Lockirin.

name: Receipt of Contribution5
description: The contribution  receipt received from  Elder Arin. Collect  5 receipts and take  them to First Elder  Lockirin.

name: Procuration of Torocco
description: "The bearer of this  procuration hereby  agrees to submit  contributions in  place of Torocco."  Take this to Elder  Keef.

name: Bright's List
description: A list of ingredients  that Guard Bright  has written. "20  Mandragora Petals, 10  bunches of Crimson  Moss"

name: Mandragora Petal
description: The petals of a  mandragora flower.  Collect 20 of these  and take them to  Guard Bright.

name: Crimson Moss
description: Crimson Moss obtained  from giant red ants.  Collect 10 of these  and take them to  Guard Bright.

name: Mandragora Bouquet
description: A flower bouquet made  of Mandragora Petals  and Crimson Moss.  Take this to Emilly  of Dion Castle Town.

name: Parman's Instructions
description: A note containing  Warehouse Keeper  Parman’s  instructions. The  instructions are to  come back after  reaching level 38.

name: Parman's Letter
description: Warehouse Keeper  Parman’s letter. Take  this to Maestro  Nikola of the Cruma  Tower.

name: Clay Dough
description: A piece of clay that  Maestro Nikola has  given. Use this to  make a copy of the  keyhole from the  Titan’s Box.

name: Pattern of Keyhole
description: The keyhole pattern  made from the Clay  Dough. Take this to  Maestro Nikola.

name: Nikolas' List
description: 20 Stakato Shells, 10  Toad Lord Sacs, 10  Spider Thorns and 10  Crystals: D Grade.

name: Stakato Shell
description: The shell of a Marsh  Stakato. A key  ingredient in making  the Titan’s Key.

name: Toad Lord Sac
description: The poison sac  removed from the neck  of an inpicio. A key  ingredient in making  the Titan's Key.

name: Spider Thorn
description: A thorn removed from  the shell of a swamp  spider. A key  ingredient in making  the Titan's Key.

name: Mark of Champion
description: A mark given to those  who have passed the  Test of the Champion.  An item for  occupational change.

name: Ascalon's Letter1
description: Veteran Ascalon’s  letter. Take this to  Mason of Dion Castle  Town.

name: Mason's Letter
description: A letter from Mason  to Veteran Ascalon of  Giran Castle Town.

name: Iron Rose Ring
description: A ring given by  Mason. The ring is  engraved with the  symbol of Iron Rose.  Complete the revenge  in place of Mason.

name: Ascalon's Letter2
description: Veteran Ascalon’s  letter. Take this to  Trader Groot of Giran  Castle Town.

name: White Rose Insignia
description: An insignia given by  Trader Groot. It was  formerly worn by the  medics of the Iron  Rose . Aid Trader  Groot in his material  gathering.

name: Groot's Letter
description: A letter from Trader  Groot to Veteran  Ascalon in Giran  Castle Town.

name: Ascalon's Letter3
description: Veteran Ascalon’s  letter. Take this to  Captain Mouen of the  Town of Oren.

name: Mouen's Order1
description: "Bring back the necks  of 100 road  scavengers or road  collectors."

name: Mouen's Order2
description: "Destroy the Leto  Lizardmen and bring  back 100 of their  fangs as proof."

name: Mouen's Letter
description: A letter from Captain  Mouen to Veteran  Ascalon of Giran  Castle Town.

name: Harpy's Egg1
description: An egg obtained after  slaying a harpy.  Collect 30 of these  and take them to  Trader Groot of Giran  Castle Town.

name: Medusa's Venom1
description: The venom obtained  after slaying a  medusa. Collect 30 of  these and take them  to Trader Groot of  Giran Castle Town.

name: Windsus Bile1
description: The bile obtained  after slaying a  windsus. Collect 30  of these and take  them to Trader Groot  of Giran Castle Town.

name: Bloody Axe Head
description: The head of a Bloody  Axe Royal Guard.  Collect 100 of these  and return to Mason  of Dion Castle Town.

name: Road Ratman Head
description: The head of a road  scavenger or  collector. Collect  100 of these and take  them to Captain  Mouen.

name: Leto Lizardman Fang1
description: The fangs of a slain  Leto Lizardman.  Collect 100 of these  and take them to  Captain Mouen.

name: Mark of Sagittarius
description: A mark given to those  who have passed the  Test of the  Sagittarius. An  occupation change  related item.

name: Bernard's Introduction
description: Take this letter and  go to Sagittarius  Hamil of the Village  of Floran.

name: Letter of Hamil1
description: Take this letter and  go to Sir Aron  Tanford of the  Southern Wastelands.

name: Letter of Hamil2
description: Take this letter and  go to Prefect Vokian  of Giran Castle Town.

name: Letter of Hamil3
description: Take this letter and  go to Gauen of the  Ivory Tower.

name: Hunter's Rune1
description: A stone engraved with  a hunter’s rune.  Collect 10 of these  and take them to  Hamil of the Village  of Floran.

name: Hunter's Rune2
description: A rune obtained from  Breka Orc Overlords  or Shamans. Collect  10 of these and take  them, along with the  Snake Talisman, to  Prefect Vokian.

name: Talisman of Kadesh
description: A strange talisman  obtained after  slaying Kadesh. Take  this to Sagittarius  Hamil of the Village  of Floran.

name: Talisman of Snake
description: Talisman that is  related to a serpent  totem spirit  worshipped by Breka  orcs. Take it to  Prefect Vokian of  Giran Castle Town.

name: Mithril Clip
description: A key ingredient in  restoring the  Crescent Bow. Take  this, along with the  rest of the  ingredients, to  Magister Gauen of the  Ivory Tower.

name: Stakato Chitin
description: A key ingredient in  restoring the  Crescent Bow. Take  this, along with the  rest of the  ingredients, to  Magister Gauen of the  Ivory Tower.

name: St Bowstring
description: A key ingredient in  restoring the  Crescent Bow. Take  this, along with the  rest of the  ingredients, to  Magister Gauen of the  Ivory Tower.

name: Manashen's Horn
description: A key ingredient in  restoring the  Crescent Bow. Take  this, along with the  rest of the  ingredients, to  Magister Gauen of the  Ivory Tower.

name: Blood of Lizardman
description: The blood shed by  Leto Lizardmen.  Kadesh appears when  enough of this is  gathered.

name: Mark of Witchcraft
description: A mark given to those  who have passed the  Test of Witchcraft.  An occupation change  related item.

name: Orim's Diagram
description: A diagram of relics,  given by Orim of the  Shadow. The 6 jewels  needed for opening  the Cube of Aklantoth  are depicted here.

name: Alexandria's Book
description: A book that contains  records on who  purchased Aklantoth's  Gems. "Master Iker,  Magister Kaira,  Trader Lara"

name: Iker's List
description: "Please bring back 20  each of Dire Wyrm  Fangs, Leto Lizardman  Charms, and  Enchanted Stone Golem  Heart Stones."

name: Dire Wyrm Fang
description: The fangs of a slain  Dire Wyrm. Collect 20  of these and take  them to Master Iker

name: Leto Lizardman Charm
description: A totem obtained  after slaying the  Leto Lizardman.  Collect 20 of these  and take them to  Master Iker

name: Enchanted Golem Heartstone
description: A crystal found  amongst the shattered  fragments of an  enhanced stone golem.  Collect 20 of these  and take them to  Master Iker

name: Lara's Memo 1
description: Trader Lara’s sales  records. It is  recorded that a man  named Ismel bought  the jewel from Lara.

name: Nestle's Memo1
description: Trader Lara’s  purchase records. It  is recorded that  Leopold of the Black  Lion brought the  jewel.

name: Leopold's Journal1
description: A portion of  Leopold’s diary. It  is recorded that 3  deserters died and  became undead while  escaping to the  Wastelands.

name: Aklantoth Gem 1
description: Gem that can be  obtained from  Magister Iker. Find  all 6 of Aklantoth  gems and take them to  Orim the Shadow.

name: Aklantoth Gem 2
description: The gem given by  Magister Kaira. Find  all 6 of Aklantoth  gems and take them to  Orim the Shadow.

name: Aklantoth Gem 3
description: The gem that can be  obtained by killing a  nameless revenant.  Find all 6 of  Aklantoth gems and  take them to Orim the  Shadow.

name: Aklantoth Gem 4
description: The gem that can be  obtained by slaying a  skeletal mercenary.  Find all 6 of  Aklantoth gems and  take them to Orim the  Shadow.

name: Aklantoth Gem 5
description: The gem that can be  obtained by slaying a  skeletal mercenary.  Find all 6 of  Aklantoth gems and  take them to Orim the  Shadow.

name: Aklantoth Gem 6
description: The gem that can be  obtained by slaying a  skeletal mercenary.  Find all 6 of  Aklantoth gems and  take them to Orim the  Shadow.

name: Brimstone1
description: A mark left behind by  the Drevanul Prince  Zeruel when escaping  from his binds.

name: Orim's Instructions
description: A set of instructions  written by Orim of  the Shadow. The  instructions are to  bring back the Sword  of Binding and Soul  Trap Crystal.

name: Orim's Letter1
description: A letter from Orim of  the Shadow to Sir  Karol Vasper of the  Town of Gludin. The  letter asks for the  loan of the Sword of  the Seal.

name: Orim's Letter2
description: A letter from Orim of  the Shadows to  Magister Iker of  Giran Castle Town.  The letter asks for  the loan of the  Soul-trap Crystal.

name: Sir Vasper's Letter
description: A letter from Sir  Karol Vasper to Vadin  of the Town of Oren.  The letter gives  permission for the  use of the Sword of  Binding.

name: Vadin's Crucifix
description: A holy crucifix of  the order, given by  Vadin. Take this and  go hunt Tamlin Orcs.

name: Tamlin Orc Amulet
description: Amulets that the  Tamlin Orcs carry for  sorcery purposes.  Gather 20 of these  and take them to  Vadin.

name: Vadin's Sanctions
description: A sanctions letter  from Vadin allowing  for the use of the  Sword of Binding.  Take this to Sir  Karol Vasper of the  Town of Gludin.

name: Iker's Amulet
description: An amulet given by  Master Iker. It is  said to have powers  of protection against  evil...

name: Soultrap Crystal
description: A crystal with the  power to trap and  seal the soul of a  monster. Use this to  seal the spirit of  the Drevanul Zeruel.

name: Purgatory Key
description: A key needed to close  Aklantoth’s Chest.  Take this to Orim of  the Shadow.

name: Zeruel Bind Crystal
description: A crystal that  contains the trapped  soul of the Drevanul  Zeruel. Take this to  Orim of the Shadow.

name: Brimstone2
description: A mark left behind by  the Drevanul Prince  Zeruel while escaping  from the body of  Fisher Evert.

name: Mark of Summoner
description: A mark given to those  who have passed the  Test of the Summoner.  An occupation change  related item.

name: Leto Lizardman Amulet
description: An amulet obtained  after slaying a Leto  Lizardman. Gather 30  of these and take  them back to Trader  Lara.

name: Sac of Redspores
description: Red spores obtained  from the bodies of  the giant fungus.  Gather 30 of these  and take them back to  Trader Lara.

name: Karul Bugbear Totem
description: A totem obtained  after slaying the  Karul Bugbear. Gather  30 of these and take  them back to Trader  Lara.

name: Shards of Manashen
description: A shard of the  shattered Manashen.  Gather 30 of these  and take them back to  Trader Lara.

name: Breka Orc Totem
description: A totem that can be  obtained after  slaying a Breka orc.  Collect 30 of them  and take them to  Trader Lara.

name: Crimson Bloodstone
description: A spirit stone  embedded in the body  of a crimson bind.  Gather 30 of these  and take them back to  Trader Lara.

name: Talons of Tyrant
description: The talon of a slain  tyrant of the  Wastelands. Gather 30  of these and take  them back to Trader  Lara.

name: Wings of Droneant
description: Wings obtained after  slaying Noble Ants at  the Ant's Nest.  Gather 30 of these  and take them back to  Trader Lara.

name: Tusk of Windsus
description: The tusks of a slain  windsus. Gather 30 of  these and take them  back to Trader Lara.

name: Fangs of Wyrm
description: The fangs of a slain  wyrm. Gather 30 of  these and take them  back to Trader Lara.

name: Lara's List 1
description: "Please gather 30  each of Leto  Lizardman Amulets and  Sacs of Red Spores."

name: Lara's List 2
description: "Please gather 30  each of the Karul  Bugbear Totems and  Shards of Manashen."

name: Lara's List 3
description: Find and bring back  30 Breka orc totems  and 30 crimson  bloodstones of  fettered soul.

name: Lara's List 4
description: "Please gather 30  each of Tyrant Talons  and Windsus Tusks."

name: Lara's List 5
description: "Please gather 30  each of Noble Ant  Wings and Wyrm  Fangs."

name: Galatea's Letter

name: Mark of Lord
description: A mark given to those  who have passed the  Test of the Lord. An  item for occupational  change.

name: Ordeal Necklace
description: A necklace given to  those who are  attempting the Test  of the Lord. Go seek  5 Chiefs of different  tribes and return  with their approvals.

name: Varkee's Charm
description: The Atuba chief  Varkees’ talisman. Go  back to him after  completing this task.

name: Tantu's Charm
description: The Neruga chief  Tantus’ talisman. Go  back to him after  completing this task.

name: Hato's Charm
description: The Urutu Chief  Hatos’ talisman. Go  back to him after  completing this task.

name: Takuna's Charm
description: The Dudamara Chief  Takuna’s charm. Go  back to him after  completing this task.

name: Chianta's Charm
description: Gandi Chief Chianta’s  charm. Go back to  him after completing  this task.

name: Tantus Charm
description: A document containing  Seer Manakia’s  orders. It tells you  to kill Breka orc  shamans and Breka orc  overlords and bring  back 20 Breka orc  fangs.

name: Breka Orc Fang
description: A Breka orc’s fang.  Collect 20 of them  and take them to Seer  Manakia.

name: Manakia's Amulet
description: A mark received after  passing Manakia’s  test. Take this to  Atuba Chief Varkees.

name: Huge Orc Fang
description: The totem of the  Atuba tribe. Gather  the totems of the 5  tribes and take them  to Paagrio Lord  Kakai.

name: Sumari's Letter
description: A letter from  Blacksmith Sumari to  Seer Somak of Dion  Castle Town.

name: Urutu Blade
description: A blade crafted by  Blacksmith Sumari.  Take this to Urutu  Chief Hatos.

name: Timak Orc Skull
description: The skull of a slain  Timak Orc. Gather 10  of these and take  them to Urutu chief  Hatos.

name: Sword Into Skull
description: The totem of the  Urutu tribe. Gather  the totems of the 5  tribes and take them  to Paagrio Lord  Kakai.

name: Neruga Axe Blade
description: The blade portion of  a ceremonial axe.  Take this to Neruga  Chief Tantus.

name: Axe of Ceremony
description: The totem of the  Neruga tribe. Gather  the totems of the 5  tribes and take them  to Paagrio Lord  Kakai.

name: Marsh Spider Feeler
description: A key ingredient in  making the Dudamara  tribe totem. Gather  10 of these and take  them to Dudamara  Chief Takuna.

name: Marsh Spider Feet
description: A key  ingredient in  making the Dudamara  tribe totem. Gather  10 of these and take  them to Dudamara  Chief Takuna.

name: Handiwork Spider Brooch
description: The totem of the  Dudamara tribe.  Gather the totems of  the 5 tribes and take  them to Paagrio Lord  Kakai.

name: Cornea of Enchanted Monster Eye
description: A key ingredient in  making the Gandi  tribe totem. Gather  20 of these and take  them to Gandi Chief  Chianta.

name: Monster Eye Woodcarving
description: The totem of the  Gandi tribe. Gather  the totems of the 5  tribes and take them  to Paagrio Lord  Kakai.

name: Bear Fang Necklace

name: Martanku's Charm
description: The talisman of the  Ancestor Martankus.  Go back to him after  completing this task.

name: Ragna Orc Head
description: The head of a slain  Ragna Orc. Take this  to the Ancestor  Martankus.

name: Ragna Chief Notice
description: “He who destroys the  Lord of Flame shall  be appointed Chief.”  Take this to the  ancestral spirit  Martankus.

name: Immortal Flame
description: The mark received  after passing the  Ancestor Martankus’  test. Take this to  Paagrio Lord Kakai.

name: Animal Lover's List
description: Go and seek  Gatekeeper Belladonna  of Gludio Castle  Town, Guard Metty of  Dion Castle Town, and  Accessory Jeweler  Ellie of Giran Castle  Town.

name: Animal Slayer's List1
description: Destroy the animal  slayers of Talking  Island: giant  spiders, pokers, and  bladers.

name: Animal Slayer's List2
description: Destroy the animal  slayers of the Elven  Forest: crimson  spiders, hook  spiders, and the  pincer spiders.

name: Animal Slayer's List3
description: Destroy the animal  slayers of the Dark  Elven Forest: lesser  dark horrors, dark  horrors, and  stoppers.

name: Animal Slayer's List4
description: Destroy the animal  slayers of the  Indomitable Plateau:  kasha spiders, kasha  poker spiders, and  kasha blade spiders.

name: Animal Slayer's List5
description: Destroy the animal  slayers of the Spine  Mountains Mining  Zone: hunter  tarantulas and  plunder tarantulas.

name: Bloody Fang

name: Bloody Claw

name: Bloody Nail

name: Bloody Kasha Fang

name: Bloody Tarantula Nail

name: Crystal Brooch

name: Delivery Score Red

name: Delivery Score Blue
description: Certificate that you  can receive if you  successfully complete  50 deliveries. The  delivery fee  increases by 4% for  each certificate.

description: Certificate of master  deliveryman received  for having  successfully  completed 1000  deliveries. 120%  delivery fee added!

name: Confirmation Document 1St

name: Confirmation Document 2Nd
description: Confirmation form the  person receiving  delivery of an item  signs. Collect two  sheets and take it to  Warehouse Chief  Gesto.
